loans.name: Fernando

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 5 filhos, 2 dos quais ainda frequentam Escola. Vive na casa própria e sustenta uma neta que vive com ele. 	
É agricultor de profissão e com presente empréstimo pretende comprar sementes várias, fertilizantes e pagar a mão-de-obra para poder aumentar as suas áreas de cultivo. 
No futuro deseja continuar a aumentar as áreas agrícolas e diversificar ainda mais as suas culturas, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é fraca produção de hortícolas no tempo chuvoso e problemas de agua.
texts.en: Fernando is married and is the father of five children, two of whom go to school.  He lives in his own home and also supports a niece that lives with him.  He is a farmer by profession.  He will use this loan to buy various seeds, fertilizers, and labor to be able to expand his cropland.  In the future, he hopes to continue increasing his land and to diversify his crops even more.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is the loss of production in the rainy season and water problems.

loans.use: to buy various seeds, fertilizers, and labor to be able to expand his cropland.

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Akossiwa a 44 ans. Elle vit a Lomé avec son mari et ses trois enfants de 10 , 26 et 18 ans. Ses trois enfants sont scolarisés. Le mari d'Akossiwa est maître maçon. Akossiwa est quand à elle propriétaire d'une boutique d'alimentation générale et de vente de cosmétique. Elle emploie une personne dans son entreprise mais souffre souvent d'un manque de capital. Elle sollicite son second prêt dans notre institution afin d'augmenter son stock et de le diversifier. Elle espère que l'agrandissement de son activité permettra un meilleur épanouissement à sa famille.
texts.en: Akossiwa is 44 years old and lives in Lomé with  her husband and her three children, aged 10, 26, and 18 years old. Her husband is a master mason. As for herself, she is the owner of a store selling grocery items and cosmetic products. She employes one person in her enterprise but often suffers from a lack of capital. She is requesting her second loan from our institution in order to increase her inventory and to diversify it. She hopes that enlarging her business will enable her family to thrive.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items and cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria forma parte del Banco Comunal “Mirando hacia un Futuro Mejor” perteneciente a la ciudad de Talca.
Ella se dedica al rubro de joyería y venta de ropa interior de damas, desde hace 2 años. Se desempeña en sus labores de lunes a domingo y su horario lo distribuye de acuerdo a su disponibilidad. Ella ofrece sus productos en bancos, colegios, hospitales y clientela fija.
Comenta que su mercadería la compra directamente en la ciudad de Santiago en comercializadoras que se especializan en vender joyas y ropa interior femenina.
Con el crédito comprará joyas de mejor calidad y categoría que le ha solicitado su clientela.
Una de las metas de Maria es tener un negocio más estable, poner un local donde pueda mostrar toda su mercadería a su clientela, y a la vez optar a una mejor calidad de vida con mayores ingresos.
Maria vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos de 9 y 12 años edad, quienes se encuentran estudiando. Sus sueños a nivel laboral son tener un local establecido para brindarle lo mejo a su familia, y ella sentirse realizada como microempresaria.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio. Respecto al grupo del Banco Comunal del cual forma parte, comenta que en éste existe muy buena comunicación. Por otro lado las capacitaciones, le han servido para aprender nuevas estrategias de venta y contabilidad.
Talca pertenece a la región del Maule, ubicada en la zona centro del país. Constituye el centro administrativo, económico y cultural de la región, siendo la ciudad más importante del Valle Central chileno. Sobre Talca existe una curiosa referencia en Chile, la frase "Talca, París, y Londres". Entre los mitos al respecto, algunos dicen que es una derivación de la originalmente dicha por un inglés "Talca parece Londres", por la abundante neblina que cubre frecuentemente la ciudad en la temporada invernal, a semejanza de la capital del Reino Unido.
texts.en:
María is part of Mirando hacia un Futuro Mejor Communal Bank in the city of Talca.  She has worked for two years in the area of jewelry and women's lingerie.

She works from Monday through Sunday, according to her availability.  She sells her products in banks, schools, and hospitals, and to steady customers.  She says she buys her merchandise in the city of Santiago directly from merchants who specialize in selling jewelry and women's lingerie.

With the loan she will buy a better quality and class of jewelry, which her customers have requested.

One of María's goals is to have a more stable business, to install a place where she can show her merchandise to her customers, and at the same time have a better quality of life with more income.

María lives with her husband and two children, ages 9 and 12, who are students.  Her dreams for work are to have a fixed location to give her family the best and to feel fulfilled as a micro-entrepreneur.

She is very happy about and grateful for the opportunity offered by Fondo Esperanza because it will allow her to invest in her business.  With regard to the communal bank group of which she is a member, she comments that they communicate well.  Also, the trainings have helped her learn new sales and accounting strategies.

Talca is in the Maule region, located in the central part of the country. It is the administrative, economic, and cultural center of the region, being the most important city in the Central Valley of Chile. There is a curious allusion to Talca in Chile, the expression "Talca, Paris, and London." Among the many myths about the matter, some say that it derives from something an English person once said, "Talca looks like London" [Spanish "parece" 'looks like' and "París" 'Paris' sound alike] because of the abundant fog that frequently covers the city in the winter season, similar to the capital of the United Kingdom.

loans.use: to buy a better quality and class of jewelry

loans.name: Kodjo

texts.fr: Kodjo a 46 ans il vit à Lomé avec sa femme et ses trois enfants âgés de 8, 12 et 15 ans et allant à l'école. L'épouse de Kodjo exerce la profession de couturière. Kodjo est pour sa part chauffeur depuis plus de 10 ans. Il sollicite un troisième crédit auprès de Wages afin de pouvoir financer l'achat d'une voiture. Les profits qu'il réalisera lui permettront d'assurer la scolarité et la santé de sa famille. A long terme il aimerait pouvoir acheter d'autres véhicules afin de monter une entreprise de taxi.
texts.en: Kodjo is 46 years old and lives in Lomé with his wife and three children, aged 8, 12 and 15 years old, who go to school. His wife is a dressmaker by trade. As for his part, Kodjo has been a taxi driver for over ten years. He is requesting a third loan from WAGES to be able to finance the purchase of a car. The profits to be made will enable him to ensure that his family's schooling and health care costs are covered. Over the long term, he would like to be able to buy more vehicles in order to set up a taxi company.

loans.use: to purchase a car for his taxi business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Biova

texts.fr: Biova a 34 ans, il a 3 enfants qui ont entre 2 et 6 ans. Deux d'entre eux vont à l'école. L'épouse de Biova est gestionnaire dans une petite société. Biova a commencé en 2009 son activité. Son travail est d'enlever les ordures ménagères. Afin de développer son activité, il a besoin d'un moteur pour sa charrette d'enlèvement. C'est dans ce but qu'il sollicite un prêt chez Wages. Biova désire réinjecter ses profits dans son activité. Il espère, à long terme, avoir un revenu suffisant pour quitter sa location et acheter son propre terrain.
texts.en:
Biova is 34 years old. He has 3 children between the ages of 2 and 6, two of whom attend school. Biova's wife is an administrator at a small company. He began his business of removing household waste in 2009.

In order to further his business, Biova needs a motor for his waste removal cart, which is why he is requesting a loan from Wages. He hopes to reinvest his profits into his business. His long-term goal is to be able to earn enough money to move out of his rented home and to purchase his own land.

loans.use: to buy a type 100 motor to renovate a household waste removal cart

loans.name: Kodjo

texts.fr: Kodjo est un jeune cambiste de 28 ans. Son métier consiste à échanger des billets de petites coupures contre des grosses coupures. Il a commencé cette activité en 2007 mais souffre toujours d'une insuffisance de capital pour son activité. Il sollicite auprès de Wages un crédit afin d'augmenter le capital de son entreprise. Il compte acheter à l'aide des futurs bénéfices de son activité une moto pour faciliter ses déplacements. Il espère que le développement de son activité permettra de prémunir sa future famille du besoin.
texts.en: Kodjo is young currency exchange agent who is 28 years old. His trade involves exchanging small bills for large bills. He began this business in 2007 but always suffers from insufficient capital. He is requesting a loan from WAGES to increase the capital for his enterprise. With the help of future profits, he plans to purchase a motorbike in order to facilitate travel. He hopes that developing his business will enable him to guard against need in his future family.

loans.use: to increase his capital for his currency exchange services

loans.name: Vodu

texts.fr: Vodu a 57 ans, elle vit avec ses deux enfants âgés de 15 et 21 ans. Son dernier enfant est encore scolarisé. Vodu exerce depuis 17 ans la profession de revendeuse de manière ambulante sur les marchés de la place. Elle vend des pagnes et des tissus. Vodu engage aujourd'hui son troisième crédit auprès de Wages dans le but d'augmenter et de diversifier son stock. Elle espère que les bénéfices qu'elle fera lui permettront d'élargir son activité. Vodu a pour projet d'ouvrir un  jour une boutique de vente de pagnes. Elle désire également pouvoir garantir à son fils une bonne éducation.
texts.en:
Vodu is 57 years old and lives with her two children, aged 15 and 21 years old. Her last child is still in school. Vodu has been working as a retailer for seventeen years going from market to local market. She sells 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa) and fabrics. She signed her third loan with WAGES today with the goal of increasing and diversifying her inventory.

She hopes that the profits to be made will enable her to expand her business. She plans one day to open a shop selling 'pagne' cloth. She would also like to be able to guarantee a good education for her son.

loans.use: to purchase 'pagne' cloth and more to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Los Amigo (Gr) Group

texts.es:
El señor Nicacio esta casado , tiene 53 años de edad, cursó los 2 años de educación primaria, tiene 6 hijos 2 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales, inicio estos negocios ya que necesitaba sustentar económicamente a su familia y hasta ahora lleva 25 años de experiencia, sembrando y cosechando.

Organiza un grupo ara solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de semillas de papas, abono, para aumentar su cultivo de papa, también va comprar concentrados para criar los animales que tiene. Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la agricultura, y a la crianza y venta de animales: ovejas, pollos, cerdos, y vacas.
texts.en:
Nicacio is a 53-year-old with a second grade education.  He is married with six children, two of which are in school.  He works in agriculture and animal breeding, a business that he started out of the need to provide for his family.  He now has 25 years of experience planting and harvesting.

Nicacio has organized a group to ask for this loan in order to purchase potato seeds and fertilizer to increase his potato harvest.  With this loan he will also buy feed for his animals.  

The other members of the group also work in agriculture as well as breeding and selling animals such as sheep, chickens, pigs and cows.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for agriculture and animal breeding.

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Akossiwa est revendeuse de produits d'alimentation générale et de mercerie. A 33 ans, elle habite à Lomé avec son mari revendeur et ses 2 enfants âgés de 6 et 10 ans et allant tous deux à l'école.  Akossiwa a commencé son activité il y a 12 ans et emploie aujourd'hui une salariée pour l'aider. Akossiwa réalise son troisième cycle de prêt chez Wages. De nouveau elle a sollicité un crédit afin d'augmenter son stock en produits alimentation générale et autres. Elle compte réemployer les profits qu'elle réalisera à l'aménagement de sa boutique. Elle espère à plus long terme pouvoir ouvrir une seconde boutique.
texts.en:
Akossiwa is a retailer of grocery items and sewing supplies. She is 33 years old and lives in Lomé with her husband, a retailer, and her two children, aged 6 and 10, both in school. She started her business twelve years ago. Today, she employes one salaried worker to help her. 

Akossiwa is completing her third loan cycle at WAGES. She again is requesting a loan to increase her stock of grocery items and more. She plans to redeploy the profits to be made in order to renovate her shop. Over the long term, she hopes to be able to open a second shop.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items and sewing supplies to sell

loans.name: Victor

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 5 filhos que frequentam Escola. Vive na casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como agente de investigação criminal na Policia da Republica de Moçambique. Com presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, barrotes, chapas e outros) para fazer acabamentos da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida vai se reflectindo dia a pós dia devido a crise financeira.
texts.en: Victor is married and is the father of five children who go to school.  He lives in his own home and doesn't support anyone else besides his family.  He works as a criminal investigation agent for the Republic of Mozambique Police Department.  He will use this loan to buy construction materials (cement, beams, metal sheets, etc.) to finish work on his home.  In the future, he hopes to finish his home.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is the elevated cost of living that is reflected day after day due to the financial crisis.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, beams, metal sheets, etc.) to finish work on his home.

loans.name: Kokoé

texts.fr: Kokoe est une veuve de 55 ans. Elle est mère de trois enfants aujourd'hui indépendants. Depuis 12 ans elle vend dans sa boutique des produits d'alimentation générale. Kokoe sollicite un deuxième crédit auprès de Wages dans le but d'acheter en grande quantité les produits qu'elle revend au détail.  Elle projette d'utiliser les futurs bénéfices pour le réaménagement de sa boutique. Kokoe aimerait également réaliser suffisamment de profit pour ouvrir une nouvelle boutique et aider ses enfants à s'installer.
texts.en: Kokoe is a widow, 55 years old, and the mother of three children, who are now independent. For twelve years, she has been selling grocery item in her shop. She is requesting a second loan from WAGES with the goal of purchasing large amounts of goods that she sells retail. She plans to use the future profits to renovate her shop. Kokoe would also like to open a new shop and to help her children get situated.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items to sell

loans.name: Apélété

texts.fr: Apelete est un jeune revendeur. Il vend sur les marchés toutes sortes de meubles et d'objet de seconde main. Il sollicite un crédit auprès de Wages afin d'augmenter la taille et la diversité de son stock. Il compte utiliser les profits qu'il réalisera en les réinvestissant dans son commence.
texts.en: Apelete is a young retailer. He sells any kind of furniture or secondhand goods at the markets. He is requesting a loan from WAGES to increase the size and diversity of his inventory. He plans to use the profits to be made by reinvesting them into his business.

loans.use: to purchase furniture and other items to sell

loans.name: Artur

texts.pt:
Casado e ainda sem filhos, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta um sobrinho que vive com ele. 	
É professor de profissão e quadro do Ministério da Educação. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (barrotes, areia, cimento, ferro, pedra e outros) para fazer acabamentos da obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja iniciar uma actividade comercial e se tornar um empresário de grande envergadura, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de condições financeiras suficientes para satisfazer suas necessidades.
texts.en: Artur is married and doesn't have kids yet.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports a nephew who lives with him.  He is a teacher by profession as part of the Ministry of Education.  He will use this loan to buy construction materials (beams, sand, cement, iron, stone, etc.) to finish work on his home.  In the future, he hopes to start a business and to become a businessman with a wide reach.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is the lack of financial resources to satisfy his needs.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (beams, sand, cement, iron, stone, etc.) to finish work on his home.

loans.name: Gilda

texts.pt:
Casada e ainda sem filhos, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. Na foto com o esposo. 	
É comerciante e dona do seu próprio negócio há bastante tempo. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (óleo, açúcar, feijão, sabão, arroz e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria e responder a demanda da sua clientela. 
No futuro deseja se tornar uma empresária de sucesso, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida.
texts.en: Gilda is married and doesn't have children yet. She lives with her family in a home they own and is not financially responsible for anyone else. She is with her husband in the photo. She is a merchant and has owned her own business for some time. She will use this loan to buy products (cooking oil, sugar, beans, soap, rice, etc.) to increase the quantity of merchandise she carries and meet her customers' needs. In the future she hopes to become a successful businesswoman. She is committed to paying off this loan so she can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. The greatest challenge she faces is the high cost of living.

loans.use: to buy products (cooking oil, sugar, beans, soap, rice, etc.) to sell.

loans.name: Claire

texts.fr: Claire a 38 ans, son mari est soudeur et elle est pour sa part revendeuse. Elle est mère de 3 enfants âgés de 5, 8 et 19 et étant tous les trois scolarisés. Depuis 7 ans, Claire vend sur les marchés des cartes de recharge des kits de connexions et autres accessoires ou appareils de téléphonie mobile. Elle sollicite un crédit auprès de Wages afin de pouvoir acheter en gros les produits qu'elle revend. Elle compte économiser ses profits pour un jour devenir grossiste et surtout pour mettre sa famille à l’abri du besoin.
texts.en: Claire is 38, her husband is a welder, and she is a saleswoman. She has three children aged 5, 8 and 19 and they all attend school. For seven years Claire has been selling top-up cards, connexion kits, and mobile phones at the markets. She requests a loan from Wages in order to buy her stock wholesale. She plans to save up her profits in order to become a wholesaler and above all to make sure her family is free from want.

loans.use: to buy top-up cards and connexion kits.

loans.name: Ayoko

texts.fr: Ayoko a 36 ans, elle vit avec son mari retraité et ses 4 enfants âgés de 4 à 15 ans. Afin de subvenir aux besoins du ménage, Ayoko vend depuis 5 ans des céréales sur le parvis de sa maison. Elle sollicite un crédit auprès de Wages afin de pouvoir acheter en grande quantité les céréales qu'elle revendra au détail. Ayoko compte épargner les profits qu'elle réalisera dans le but d'ouvrir une boutique en dehors de sa maison. Ayoko espère surtout qu'elle parviendra le mieux possible à assurer l'éducation et la santé de ses enfants.
texts.en: Ayoko is 36 years old and lives with  her retired husband and her four children, aged 4 to 15 years old. To support her household, Ayoko has been selling grains at the entry of her house for five years. She is requesting a loan from WAGES in order to purchase large amounts of grains that she will sell retail. Ayoko plans to save the profits to be made with the goal of opening a shop outside her house. She hopes in particular she will achieve as much as possible in order to ensure her children's health care and education.

loans.use: to purchase grains (corn) to sell from home

loans.name: Akoele

texts.fr: Akoele a 46 ans, elle vit avec ses deux enfants de 10 et 14 et allant tous deux à l'école. Elle exerce la profession de revendeuse. Elle vend principalement des articles scolaires, des pagnes et des produits d'alimentation générale. Elle vend ses articles sur une étale du marché de Lomé. Sa principale difficulté est la fluctuation de prix. Elle sollicite auprès de Wages un troisième crédit afin d'augmenter son stock. Elle compte économiser les profits qu'elle réalisera. Son projet pour l'avenir est de devenir une grossiste même si sa priorité reste l'épanouissement de sa famille.
texts.en:
Akoele is 46 years old and lives with her 2 children, aged 10 and 14, who both go to school. She is a retailer. She sells mainly school supplies, pagnes (highly colourful and decorative West African clothing) and grocery products. She sells her products on a stall at the Lomé market. The main challenge to her business is fluctuating product prices.

Akoele is requesting a 3rd loan from WAGES in order to be able to increase her stock. She plans to save the profits she earns. Her future ambition is to become a wholesaler, though ensuring the development of her family remains her priority.

loans.use: to buy school supplies, pagnes and grocery products.

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr: Abla est une veuve de 48 ans, elle vit avec ses deux enfants de 16 et 23 ans, tous deux scolarisés. Depuis 1998, elle vend des pagnes de différentes qualités sur le parvis de sa maison. Elle emploie à ce jour une personne pour l'aider dans son travail. Elle sollicite son troisième crédit auprès de Wages afin d'augmenter son stock et son choix de pagnes. Elle projette d'utiliser les profits qu'elle réalisera pour commencer la construction d'une boutique dans sa maison. Elle espère que le développement de son activité assurera le bien être de sa famille.
texts.en:
Abla is a 48-year-old widow living with her two children, aged 16 and 23, who are both in school. Since 1998, she has been selling 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa) of different qualities on the front patio of her house. She employs one person currently helping her with her work. 

Abla is requesting her third loan from WAGES to increase her inventory and her selection of 'pagne' cloth. She plans to use the profits she will make to start building a shop in her house. She hopes that developing her business will ensure her family's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase 'pagne' cloth to sell

loans.name: Comlan

texts.fr: Comlan est un jeune revendeur de 31 ans. Il est pour le moment célibataire. Il vend des appareils électroniques  sur les marchés depuis 3 ans. Il a sollicité pour la deuxième fois un crédit auprès de WAGES afin d'augmenter la taille de son stock. Il compte épargner les profits qu'il réalisera dans le but d'ouvrir à long terme une boutique.
texts.en: Comlan is a young retailer who is 31 years old and not currently married. He has been selling electronics at markets for three years. He is requesting a loan from WAGES for a second time to increase his inventory. Comlan plans to save the profits to be made with the aim of opening a store in the long term.

loans.use: to purchase electronics to sell

loans.name: Kossi

texts.fr: Kossi a 27 ans, il est célibataire. Il exerce la profession de cordonnier depuis plus de 5 ans. Il vend et fabrique des chaussures pour adultes et pour enfants. Il sollicite un crédit auprès de Wages afin d'acheter les produits nécessaires à la fabrication de chaussure : semelle, colle, lassé.... Il compte réinvestir les profits qu'il fera afin d'agrandir son atelier et, pourquoi pas, en créer un autre. Il espère surtout avoir un revenu lui permettant de fonder une famille et de répondre à ses besoins.
texts.en:
Kossi is 27 years old and single.  He has been working as a shoemaker for over five years.  He makes and sells shoes for adults and children.

He is requesting a loan from WAGES in order to buy the necessary supplies to make shoes: soles, glue, shoe-laces...  He is planning to reinvest his expected profits into expanding his shop and - maybe - even into opening a new one.

He especially hopes to have an income that will allow him to have a family and to meet his own needs.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make shoes.

loans.name: Duo Luz De Vida Group

texts.es:
Dúo luz de vida.
Este dúo está integrado por la señora wuqu' es casada y tiene un hijo de 1 año de edad ella es originaria de San Juan Comalapa, ella se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos en telar, ella se dedica a esta actividad desde hace varios años, está solicitando este crédito para la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de sus tejidos ya que está convencida de que con más capital podrá aumentar más sus ganancias para ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Dúo luz de vida [Light of Life Duo]

One member of this duo is Wuqu', who is married and has a one-year-old son. She is originally from San Juan Comalapa. She makes a living creating woven products on a loom, and has been doing this for several years. 

She is requesting this loan for the purchase of raw materials for the creation of her woven products, as she is certain that with more capital she can increase her earnings to help her family.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for the creation of traditional woven products to be sold.

loans.name: Mariza

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 4 filhos dos quais 3 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais um enteado enviando dinheiro para ajudar nas despesas. 	
Trabalha como secretaria dos antigos combatentes. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material eléctrico para a instalação na sua residência e pagar o contrato na EDM. 
No futuro deseja terminar com a instalação e poder lá morar com a sua família, mobilar e remodelar o seu estabelecimento, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo para poder ter a oportunidade de pedir outro.
texts.en: Mariza is a widow and has four children, three of whom are still in school. She lives with her family in a home they own and also supports a stepson, sending money to help him with his expenses. She works for the department of veterans affairs. She will use this loan to buy electrical supplies to install electricity in her home and pay for her contract with the utility company. In the future she hopes to finish installing the electricity to live there with her family, and then furnish and remodel her shop. She is committed to paying off this loan so she can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. She will work hard to pay off this loan so she can have the chance to request another.

loans.use: to buy electrical supplies to install electricity in her home and pay for her contract with the utility company

loans.name: Aniceto

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos que frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como segurança do banco. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (pedra, areia, ferro, cimento, e outros) para fazer acabamentos na obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e mudar de profissão devido ao risco que corre na sua vida, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar durante a noite e num lugar onde fica o dinheiro.
texts.en: Aniceto is married and is the father of two children who go to school.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  He works as a security guard at a bank.  He will use this loan to buy construction materials (stone, sand, iron, cement, etc.) to finish work on his home.  In the future, he hopes to finish his home and to change professions due to the risk that his current job involves.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is working at night and in a place where money is kept.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (stone, sand, iron, cement, etc.) to finish work on his home.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos dos quais 3 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como operador de máquinas numa empresa de produção de bananas. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (areia, cimento, ferro, pedra, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa, adquirir uma motobomba para a sua machamba, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a insuficiência de fundos para realizar todos os seus projectos.
texts.en: Rafael is married and the father of four children, three of whom attend school. He lives with his family in a home they own and is not financially responsible for anyone else. He works as a machine operator for a banana company. He will use this loan to buy construction materials (sand, cement, iron, stone, etc.) to continue building his house. In the future he hopes to finish his house and purchase an electric pump for his farm. He is committed to paying off this loan so she can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. His greatest challenge is the lack of funds to carry out all his projects.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (sand, cement, iron, stone, etc.) to continue building his house.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa da sua mãe com os seus filhos não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É negociante e dona do próprio negócio de venda de produtos diversos na RSA. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (capulanas, bebidas , e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja construir uma casa própria para melhor confortar os seus filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar mais e melhorar as suas condições de vida.
texts.en: Luisa is unmarried and has two school-aged children. She and her children live with her mother, and she is not financially responsible for anyone else. She has a business selling a variety of goods in South Africa. She will use this loan to buy products (capulanas [sarongs], soft drinks, etc.) to increase the quantity of merchandise she carries. In the future she hopes to build her own house to offer her children a more comfortable life. She is committed to paying off this loan so she can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. She will work hard to improve the living situation for herself and his family.

loans.use: to buy capulanas (sarongs) and soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Marta

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos menores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua mãe que vive com ela. 	
É docente e quadro do Ministério de Educação. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (pedra, cimento, blocos, vidros, e outros), para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a casa e mobilar, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar mais para obter mais rendimento e o pagamento devido do empréstimo
texts.en:
Marta is married and has two young children. She lives in her own home with her family and also supports her mother, who lives with her.
She works as a teacher for the Ministry of Education. She will use this loan to buy construction materials (stone, cement, cinder blocks, glass, etc.) to continue the work on her house.
In the future she hopes to finish her house and furnish it. She is committed to paying off this loan so she can apply for further loans from Hluvuku.
She will work hard to increase her income and pay off this loan.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (stone, cement, cinder blocks, glass, etc.) to continue the work on her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials (sand, cement, stone, iron, etc.) to continue the work on her house.

loans.name: Palmira

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 4 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com os seus filhos e sustenta a sua mãe que vive com ela. 	
Trabalha como empacotadora numa empresa de produção de bananas. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, chapas, ferro, barrotes, e outros), para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.  
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa para melhor confortar a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo e a falta de fundos suficientes.
texts.en: Palmira is unmarried and has four school-aged children. She and her children live in their own home, and she also supports her mother, who lives with them. She works as a baler for a banana company. She plans to use this loan to buy construction materials (cement, sheet metal, iron, beams, etc.) to continue the work on her house. In the future she hopes to finish the house so she can offer her family a more comfortable life. She is committed to paying off this loan so she can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. Her greatest challenges are paying off this loan and the lack of sufficient funds.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, sheet metal, iron, beams, etc.) to continue the work on her house.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 6 filhos maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 2 netas que vivem com ela. 	
Trabalha como secretaria numa associação de nome guê-gue-gue. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, barrotes, pedra, chapas, e outros), para dar continuidade a obra das dependências para aluguer. 
No futuro deseja terminar as dependências de aluguer para obter mais rendimento, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo para poder ter oportunidade de mais empréstimos.
texts.en: Sofia is single and has six adult children. She lives in her own home with her family and also supports two granddaughters, who live with her. She works as a secretary for an organization called Guê-gue-gue. She will use this loan to buy construction materials (cement, beams, stone, sheet metal, etc.) to continue building rooms to rent out. In the future she hopes to finish the rental spaces to increase her income. She is committed to paying off this loan so she can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. She will work hard to pay off this loan so she can have the chance to request more.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, beams, stone, sheet metal, etc.) to finish building rooms to rent out.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos dos quais 3 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua mãe que vive com ele. 	
É polícia e tem um negócio de criação e venda de frangos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar pintos, ração, vitaminas, e outros para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja ampliar o seu aviário e adquirir uma viatura para transportar os frangos ate o local de venda, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é produzir mais frangos, e o pagamento devido do empréstimo.
texts.en: Pedro is married and the father of four children, three of whom are still in school. He lives with his family in a home they own and also supports his mother, who lives with them. He is a policeman and also has a business raising and selling chickens. He will use this loan to buy chicks, feed, vitamins, and so on to increase his stock. In the future he hopes to expand his chicken coop and acquire a vehicle that he can use to transport his birds to market. He is committed to paying off this loan so he can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. He will work hard to raise more chicks and pay off this loan.

loans.use: to buy chicks, feed, vitamins, and so on to increase his stock.

loans.name: Joana

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos, 1 ainda frequenta Escola. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Negociante há bastante tempo e Com presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (areia, cimento, pedra, chapas, e outros) para fazer acabamentos da varanda da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja construir dependências de aluguer para obter mais rendimento, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar a dobrar e continuar com os empréstimos.
texts.en: Joana is married and has five children, one of whom is in school. She lives with her family in a home they own and is not financially responsible for anyone else. She has had her own business for some time and will use this loan to buy construction materials (sand, cement, stone, sheet metal, etc.) to finish the veranda on her house. In the future she hopes to build rooms to rent out to increase her income. She is committed to paying off this loan so that she can request further loans from Hluvuku. Her greatest challenges are how hard she has to work and paying off the loans.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (sand, cement, stone, sheet metal, etc.) to finish the veranda on her house.

loans.name: Abdoul

texts.fr: Abdoul est un homme marié.Il est père de trois enfants dont les deux fréquentent l'école.Depuis plusieurs années, il tient un commerce de matériel de construction (ciment, plomberie...) dans une quincaillerie.Ce commerce ui rapporte des revenus assez substantiels qui lui permettent de prendre en charge les dépenses d'entretien de sa famille ainsi que ses propres besoins.Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un pret de 500000f pour acheter du ciment.Son ambition est d'ouvrir d'autres quincaillerie.
texts.en:
Abdoul is a married man.  He is the father of three children, two of whom attend school.  

For several years now, he has been selling building materials (cement, plumbing supplies...) inside a hardware store.

This business brings him a good income and he is able to cover his family expenses and to meet his own needs.

In order to boost his business, he is requesting a loan of 500,000 francs for the purchase of cement.  His ambition is to open other hardware stores.

loans.use: to buy cement.

loans.name: Bathié

texts.fr: Mr Bathié âgé de 40 ans, marié et père de famille a quitté son village natal pour venir s’installer dans une ville ou il pense pouvoir faire fortune.Il a amené toute sa famille puisque ne pouvant les laisser derrière lui. Mr Bathié s’est très tôt  lancé dans le commerce, il a une boutique non loin de l’Institution et y passe toute la journée du matin au soir de 7h à 23 h.Il a une expérience de plus de 7 ans dans le secteur du commerce et il sollicite un prêt de 300 000 f pour acheter des denrées alimentaires telles que du lait, du sucre,du savon et divers autres produits alimentaires.Cela pour renforcer son stock afin de pouvoir générer plus de bénéfices et épargner régulièrement pour mieux s’occuper de la famille.Comme projet futur,il aimerait un jour devenir grossiste.
texts.en:
Bathié is 40 years old.  He is married and has a family.  He has come to settle in the city with his family, whom he takes very good care of.

Bathié started working in retail business a long time ago.  He has a shop, not far from the (microfinance) institution, and he spends his whole day there, from 7 o'clock in the morning until 11 o'clock at night.

He has more than 7 years of experience in retail business.  He is requesting a loan of 300,000 francs which will be used to boost his business.  This loan will allow him to make more profits, which will in turn help him to regularly save some money and to better provide for his family.

Bathié's dream is to become a wholesaler one day.

loans.use: to buy food supplies for his shop.

loans.name: Awa

texts.fr: Awa est une femme mariée qui exerce un commerce de tissus teints "ganila" et "thioub simple".Elle est mère de trois enfants. Elle a en charge leur nourriture, leur habillement et leur soins sanitaires.Elle sollicite un pret de 500000f pour acheter des balles de tissus pour maximiser ses bénéfices à un mois de la fête de "tabaski".
texts.en: Awa is a married woman who has a business selling the dyed fabrics "ganila" and simple "bazin". She is the mother of 3 children. She is responsible for feeding and clothing them as well as for their health care. She is requesting a loan of 500 000 francs with which to buy bales of fabric, so that she can maximise her profits one month before the festival of Tabaski.

loans.use: to buy bales of fabric.

loans.name: Suraya

texts.pt:
Divorciada e mãe de 3 filhos, 1 ainda frequenta Escola. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Negociante e vende diversos produtos há bastante tempo. Com presente empréstimo pretende comprar bens de consumo (geleiras, microondas e outros) para revender e aumentar a sua receita. 
No futuro deseja construir um salão de cabeleireiro e adquirir uma viatura, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é desalfandegar a mercadoria e seu respectivo transporte.
texts.en: Suraya is divorced and has three children, one of whom is still in school. She lives with her family in a home they own and is not financially responsible for anyone else. She has had a business selling a variety of products for some time. She will use this loan to buy appliances (refrigerators, microwaves, etc.) to sell and increase her earnings. In the future she hopes to build a beauty salon and buy a vehicle. She is committed to paying off this loan so she can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. Her greatest challenge is retrieving her merchandise from customs and transporting it.

loans.use: to buy consumer goods (refrigerators, microwaves, etc.) to sell and increase her earnings.

loans.name: Abdou

texts.fr: Abdou exerce un commerce de produits cosmétiques dans sa cantine située près de la gare routière de sa localité.Il est célibataire sans enfants.Il supporte toutefois avec les revenus de  son commerce, l'essentiel des dépenses d'entretien de sa famille(ses deux parents , ses frères et sœurs).Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un pret de 225 000f pour acheter des produits cosmétiques.Son ambition est de faire des voyages de commerce en chine.
texts.en:
Abdou sells cosmetic products in a booth located next to the bus station of his locality.  He is single, with no children.

However, he uses his income to take care of his two parents, his brothers and sisters, and he covers most of their daily living expenses.

In order to boost his business, he is requesting a loan of 225,000 francs for the purchase of cosmetic products.

His ambition is to go on business trips to China.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products.

loans.name: Al Ouma Tivaouane Diacksao Groupe 1

texts.fr: AL OUMA TIVAOUANE DIACKSAO GROUPE 1 regroupe 11 femmes qui adhèrent toutes dans la meme association. Elles exercent des activités génératrices de revenus dans le secteur du commerce, ce qui leurs permet de se procurer des revenus et de subvenir a une partie de leurs besoins familiaux. Elles habitent le meme quartier et  sont représentées par madame Mame Bousso qui a levé la main  sur la photo. Elle est mariée et s’adonne au commerce depuis plus de 12 ans. Elle pratique la vente de produits locaux, de poissons séchés et de tissus  dans la localité ou elle habite. Elle sollicite un crédit dans le but d’augmenter son fond de roulement et d’acheter des tissus et produits locaux qu’elle commercialise afin de mieux développer son activité de commerce. Sa journée de travail démarre à 8 heures et se termine à 13 heures. Son objectif est de d’élargir son marché de commerce pour devenir dans le futur une commerçante  grossiste.
texts.en: The "Al Ouma Tivaouane Diacksao groupe 1" unites 11 women who all belong to the same association. They all earn money as retailers, which allows them to generate incomes to meet some of their family's needs. They live in the same district and are represented by Bousso, who has raised her hand in the picture. She is married and has been in retail for over 12 years. She sells local products, dried fish and fabrics in the village where she lives. She is requesting a loan in order to raise her working capital and buy some fabrics and local products that she sells so that she can better develop her business. Her workday starts at 8am and ends at 1pm. Her aim is to expand her retail market so that she can one day become a wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy local products and fabrics for resale.

loans.name: Loan

texts.en: Loan was born in 1988. She has two little children. Her husband is a car repairer. She weaves bamboo and sells stationery for a living and gains from it 2,000,000 VND per month. The total earnings of her family is about 6,000,000 VND per month. She has taken part in the crediting program of SEDA since 2011. In the last cycle, she borrowed 5,152,000 VND and repaid this loan on time. In this loan cycle, she wants to borrow 7,392,000 VND to invest in her bamboo weaving. Then, she hopes her business can get enough money to pay for her children’s education fees.

loans.use: to invest in her bamboo weaving.

loans.name: Juman Group

texts.en:
Juman Group is made up of 9 members who are all women and sell the following commodities: provisions, beans, chicken, plastic products, fruits, vegetables, fish, underwear and detergents. They have been together as a group since 2009. Five members are on their fifth loan; two members are on their fourth loan; one person is on her second loan; and one person is on her first loan. They meet every Thursday to discuss business and pay loans. This group is in the eastern part of the town.

Charllote is a 43-year-old trader married to a 49-year-old driver, and they have a 19-year-old girl. She operates a small cold store and a provision shop where she sells fruits, vegetables, chicken, meat, fish, rice, sugar and sardines. She paid back her previous loan amount of 700 Ghana cedis successfully, and now she needs 900 Ghana cedis to stock her shop by buying more provisions, meat and fish. This is her fifth loan cycle with ID-Ghana, and she is very loyal to the microfinance institution. She has been reinvesting her profit that she makes from sales.

They need a total amount of 4,800 Ghana cedis to be able to buy more commodities.

loans.use: To buy more fruits, vegetables, provisions, meat and fish.

loans.name: Matar

texts.fr: Notre emprunteur s’appelle Matar, il fait de l’embouche bovine depuis plus de 30 ans maintenant. Il a pratiquement fait cela durant toute sa vie ,l’ayant hérité de ses parents. Matar loge dans un petit village ou il fait son activité d'embouche. Il est à son 3ème crédit à l’IMCEC  et souhaite renouveler un montant de 250000 F CFA,  afin de pouvoir acheter 2 bœufs, qu’il va élever pendant 7 à 8 mois avant de le revendre. Matar a toujours nourri sa famille avec les revenus de son activité ; c’est pourquoi, il désire augmenter son fond afin de pouvoir donner un départ aussi à son fils ainé en lui ouvrant une boutique d’alimentation générale. Compte fait, ce dernier pourra l’aider dans les autres charges de la maison.
texts.en:
Our borrower's name is Matar.  He has been fattening cattle for more than 30 years now.  Cattle-fattening is an activity he has been involved in for almost all his life, having learned it from his parents.

Matar lives in a little village.  This is his third loan with UIMCEC, and he is requesting a new loan of 250,000 CFA francs in order to buy two oxen that he will raise for seven to eight months before reselling them.

Matar has always provided for his family with the income he gets from his business.  This is why he would now like to boost his activity in order to be able to give a start in life to his oldest son,  by opening a grocery store for him.  

Once his son has his own business, he will be able to help his father with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy two oxen that he will raise and resell.

loans.name: Saveith

texts.en: Saveith is 42 years old. She is married and lives with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling fertilizer, rice and fuel for more than a year, earning approximately $25 per day. Her husband (who is joining her in the picture) is a rice farmer who earns about $5 each day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Saveith is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase a bulldozer for rental. This purchase will help her acquire the security to start the new business. In the future, she would like to run a gas station and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a bulldozer for rental.

loans.name: Benkadi E Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe BENKADI E sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 30 ans, 5 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à  GOLOKOUNA, un des villages de SIKASSO, 3ème  région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur deuxième prêt avec l’institution, le prêt passé a été bien remboursé.
La spéculation cultivée est  le sorho  avec  ABY debout en deuxième position à partir de la droite vers la gauche. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter les intrants et semences pour entretenir  1,5 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, au marché de SIKASSO après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 190.000 FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the group "BENKADI E" are married women averaging 30 years of age and five children each all living in polygamous families in GOLOKOUNA, a village in SIKASSO (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farm work during the rainy season. They are on their second loan with the institution. The past loan was indeed paid back. 

The crop grown is sorghum, as is the case with ABY, who is the one in the photo standing second from the right. With her loan, she intends to purchase farm inputs and seeds for maintaining 1.5 hectares.

After the harvest, the produce is sold in the village, at the SIKASSO market, to a customer base composed of men and women. ABY plans on making an average profit of 190,000 francs CFA per planting. This profit will enable her to repay her loan and also to help her husband with day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and seeds

loans.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es: Sandra muy consciente de la oportunidad, “vende todo lo que el tendero no vende” como ella misma lo dice, así usted puede encontrar en su Stock, útiles de aseo en papeletas, unidades que la clientela compra mucho, productos de patillaje en el peso y en la medida que requieran los compradores, y en general artículos llamados productos en canal. Cuenta con 4 empleaos en la distribución tienda a tienda y con ello le ha ido muy bien, especialmente porque con su credikiva anterior ha logrado invertir mucho mas en estos artículos y aumentar su volumen de ventas. Hoy está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el que comprará productos de aseo personal, productos de cacharrería, dulcería, productos naturales e insumos de pastillaje. Ella planea el éxito de su inversión justificando que  tiene pleno conocimiento del mercado, hace su preventa para garantizar, compras ajustadas a las expectativas del cliente y es oportuna en la entrega de sus pedidos, pues tiene los empleados que requiere su segmento de mercado. Ella expresa que Gracias a Kiva y al apoyo de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo ha podido lograr el crecimiento de su negocio. “
texts.en:
Sandra is very much aware of the opportunity that exists in "selling everything that the [average] shopkeeper doesn't sell".  Among her stock, you can find small packets of personal care products which are very popular with her customers, baking products by weight and how her customers need them, and other general items.  She has four employees who distribute products store to store and things have gone very well, especially because she used her previous Kiva loan to invest a lot more in these items and increased her sales volume. 

Sandra is now applying for a new Kiva loan which she will use to buy personal care products, hardware products, candies, natural products and baking supplies.  She believes that she will invest successfully because she has good market knowledge.  She pre-sells in order to guarantee her sales, adapts her purchases according to her customers' expectations and delivers her orders on time as she has the employees that she needs for her market segment.  She says that, thanks to Kiva and support from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, she has managed to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy personal care products, hardware products, candies, natural products and baking supplies

loans.name: Frechielyn

texts.en:
Frechielyn is a married woman and a mother of two young children from Bohol, Philippines. She and her husband have been in the rice farming business for some time now. This is the source of their income. Frechielyn is in need of additional funds for their business. She is asking for a loan worth 5,000 PHP to buy fertilizers for the plants. With this, she will be able to grow healthy rice.

Frechielyn hopes to expand the business so that it will continue to generate income for the family. Moreover, she wants to save for future schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for the plants.

loans.name: Pharat

texts.en:
Pharat is 29 years old. She is married and resides with her two children in Kratie Province, Cambodia.

She has been selling groceries for more than two years, earning approximately $10 a day. Her husband (who is joining her in the picture) is a farmer who earns about $8 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Pharat is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase more groceries to resell. By doing so, she would be able to generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to use the profits to expand her business and send her children to good schools. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to resell.

loans.name: Amgalan

texts.en:
Mr. Amgalan, 51, is a taxi driver, and he is taking a loan to complete his new house building. He has been operating his taxi business for seven years nonstop and he has gained a lot of experience in it. All of his children moved out and now he lives with his wife in a ger, a nomadic Mongolian traditional yurt in Ulaanbaatar, which is the capital city of Mongolia. His wife is a teacher. He is planning to add insulation to the walls, and it will be helpful to cut the usage of the coal-fired furnace and to live warmer at home. He is also planning to insulate the roof hollow due to the heat loss through it. 

So he is requesting a loan to pay for the building materials such as foam, rock wool, and cement to make the insulation for his new family house.

loans.use: to pay for the building materials such as foam, rock wool, and cement for making the insulation to his new family house.

loans.name: Shavkat

texts.ru: Шавкат- молодой парень, женат и имеет одну дочку.   Живет за городом и занимается откормом скота на дому.  Он в основном откармливает баранов и овец.  Корм покупает по оптовой цене.  В сельской местности "животноводство" является основным занятием жителей.  Шавкат в свободное время занимается строительными работами по заказу и имеет ежедневную выручку. На полученный кредит он  решил получить кредит  и увеличить поголовье скота, хочет откормить их до национального  праздника Курбан, когда все закупают  скот по традиции на жертвоприношение.   Он надеется получить прибыль и таким образом увеличить свои активы.   Рад, что сотрудничает с нами.
texts.en:
Shavkat is a young, married man with two daughters. He lives outside of the city where he fattens livestock at his home. He mostly fattens rams and ewes, and he buys the feed for wholesale prices. 

In this rural location, residents mostly work in animal husbandry. Shavkat also works in construction on a contact basis in his free time, and this provides him with daily earnings. 

Shavkat decided to request this loan in order to increase the amount of livestock he owns. He wants to fatten them until the national holiday Kurban, when everyone traditionally buys livestock to sacrifice. He hopes to make a profit that will increase his assets. He is happy to be working with you!

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Sok Laun

texts.en:
Sok Laun (pictured with her husband and her children) is 34 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kratie Province, Cambodia.

She has been selling dessert for more than two years, earning approximately $8 per day. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $8 a day. In order to increase her family’s income, Sok Laun is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase a walking tractor to run a tilling service. This purchase will help her generate additional income to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelors degrees. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a walking tractor to run a tilling service.

loans.name: Sok Khon

texts.en:
Sok Khon is 51 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is involved in growing lotus and earns about $10 a day. Two of her children are employed in a hotel. They earn about $7 each day. 

Sok Khon wants to build a new house. With this goal in mind, Sok Khon is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase timbers and zinc to build her house. In addition, part of this money is used to pay for the construction service. This money would enable her to provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to help her children earn bachelors degrees.

loans.use: to purchase timbers and zinc to build her house.

loans.name: Batjargal

texts.en: Mr. Batjargal, 40, is a carpenter and he is requesting his next loan. This time he needs some support to make repairs to his old apartment. He lives with his wife and his two children in an apartment in Darkhan, which is the second largest city in Mongolia. Lately his apartment's rooms have heat loss through its bad windows, which were made in the socialist era many years ago. They were damaged a lot and have chips everywhere. In winter he uses a small coal or wood fired furnace in his kitchen heat the rooms. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to covering the cost of the new double glazed windows to his apartment.

loans.use: to purchase decoration and building materials to repair his apartment.

loans.name: Srey Mom

texts.en:
Srey Mom is 28 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She has been selling fish for more than four years, earning approximately $2 daily. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $4 per day. 

Srey Mom is requesting a loan of $900 to purchase construction materials to fix the walls of her house. In the future, she would like to expand her business and send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to fix the walls of her house.

loans.name: Thain

texts.en:
Thain is 61 years old. She is a widow and resides with one child in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She has been involved in growing rice and making creel (a type of basket) to sell for more than twenty years, earning approximately $3 daily. Her child helps her making creel and baskets to sell, and earns about $4 each day. 

Thain cannot access fresh water. Therefore, Thain is requesting a loan of $300 to pay for the expenses of digging a well. By doing so, she would be able to have enough water to use in her daily living. 

In the future, she would like to run an additional business which involves animal husbandry, and rebuild her house to make it more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to pay for the expenses of digging the well

loans.name: Nara

texts.en:
Nara is 42 years old. She is married and lives with her three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $10 a day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Nara is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the money she can save on her transportation expenses to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to purchase rice to store in a warehouse and resell when the price is higher, and send her children to a good school. Moreover, she plans to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Chantha

texts.en:
Chantha is 48 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She has been selling groceries and all kinds of drinks for more than five years, earning approximately $5 per day. Her husband sells boats. He earns about $6 a day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Chantha is requesting a loan of $1,500 to increase capital in her husband's business so that he can purchase more boats to resell. This money will help him generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to build a new house and help her children earn bachelors degrees.

loans.use: to raise capital in her husband's business so that he can purchase more boats to resell.

loans.name: Samay

texts.en:
Samay is 40 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She has been working as a teacher for more than ten years, earning approximately $2 a day. Her husband runs a washing shop. He earns about $5 a day. One of her children is a garment worker who earns about $5 each day. 

Samay is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase equipment for her husband to use for washing cars. This money will help her husband run the business smoothly. In the future, she would like to sell groceries from home and help her children earn bachelors degrees.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for her husband to use for washing cars.

loans.name: Oyuntsetseg

texts.en:
Mrs. Oyuntsetseg, 41, runs a noodle house, and she has been operating it since last year. Her noodle house is located at a nearby primary school. In a day she has approximately 20-25 customers and most of them are satisfied for her made bowls of noodles. She lives with her husband and her two kids in the apartment in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has a lot of customers from September to June every year during the academic year.  

So she wanted to increase her working capital such as noodles and dinner services. The loan she is taking will be used to pay for the uncooked noodles and renewing dinner services.

loans.use: to pay for uncooked noodles and renewing dinner services.

loans.name: Mavzuna

texts.ru: Мавзуна  энергичная женщина с высшим образованием но по семейным обстоятельством она работает не по специальности.   Она торгует на вещевом рынке, женской одеждой.    У неё хороший ассортимент и товар пользуется большим спросом.   Мавзуна наша клиентка почти уже 10 лет и самая лояльная среди клиентов,она непрерывно пользуется нашими услугами и всегда целенаправленно использует кредит по назначению.   у неё трое взрослых сыновей-двоё из них близнецы,   которые окончили школу и поступили в вуз.   Сейчас у Мавзуны много семейных расходов и она с мужем работают усердно,чтобы покрыть эти расходы.  Очередной кредит запрашивает на закуп оптовой партии школьной одежды, так как  начинается учебный год.  Благодарит нашу организацию за помощь и поддержку.
texts.en:
Mavzuna is an energetic woman. She has a higher education degree, but because of family circumstances, she does not work in her field. She sells women's clothes in a market. She has a nice selection, and her goods are on high demand. 

Mavzuna has been our client for more than 10 years, and she is the most loyal of our clients. She continuously uses our services, and she always uses the loan for the intended purpose. 

She has three grown sons, two of which are twins who have finished school and started university study. 

Mavzuna has many family expenses right now. She and her husband work tirelessly to cover all of these expenses. She is requesting this loan to purchase wholesale school clothes, as the school year is starting soon. She thanks your organization for the assistance and support.

loans.use: to buy shcool clothes

loans.name: Rom Doul

texts.en:
Rom Doul is 30 years old. She is married and blessed with two children. She lives in Takeo Province, Cambodia. 

She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up animals for more than seven years, earning approximately $2 per day. Her husband runs a business of purchasing motorcycles to resell. He earns about $12 a day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Rom Doul is requesting a loan of $1,500 to raise capital in her husband's business, so that he can purchase more motorcycles to resell. In the future, she would like to expand her business and send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to raise capital in her husband's business, so that he can purchase more motorcycles to resell.

loans.name: Rina

texts.en: Mrs. Rina, 41, is a cook and works in the cafeteria in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has been doing her job for two years. Before she used to work in the restaurant as a chef. She lives with her husband and her daughter in the ger district, an area of the city with no running water, minimal roads and spotty electricity. Her husband is a driver, and he is now unemployed. Therefore, he wanted start a new business such as a taxi business, as he said it will be a big contribution for his family to increase their income further. He and Rina planned to buy a car that has an electric engine, which is called a Toyota for their new business. It will not create any toxic smoke to the air. The loan she is requesting will be used to cover the cost of a electric car for her husband starting a taxi business.

loans.use: to cover the cost of an electric car for her husband to start a taxi business.

loans.name: Reth

texts.en:
Reth is 48 years old. She is from Takeo Province, Cambodia, married, and blessed with one child. Reth has been selling grilled chicken for more than three years, earning approximately $4 each day. Her husband is a fisherman who earns about $4 daily. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Reth is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase more chicken to grill and sell. In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase more chicken to grill and sell

loans.name: Vanna

texts.en:
Vanna is 47 years old. She is from Takeo Province, Cambodia, married, and blessed with four children. Vanna has been selling grilled chicken for more than 10 years, earning approximately $7 per day. Her husband is a rice farmer who earns about $1 daily. Three of her children are employed. They earn about $15 each day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Vanna is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money from her transportation expenses to support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her youngest child earn a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Neth

texts.en:
Neth is 30 years old. She is married and resides with one child in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in weaving Krama (sturdy traditional Cambodian garments) for more than 7 years, earning approximately $3 daily. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $3 each day. 

In order to improve her business, Neth is requesting a loan of $900 to purchase more silk threads to use for weaving. This money will help her make more Kramas to sell and earn more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and send her child to a good school. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase more silk theads to use for weaving

loans.name: Saroeurn

texts.en:
Saroeurn is 42 years old. She is widowed and resides with four siblings in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up animals for more than ten years. In addition, she runs a grocery store at home. She earns about $3 each day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Saroeurn is requesting a loan of $600 to purchase more groceries to sell. By doing so, she would be able to generate more profit to financially support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Abduhamid

texts.ru: Абдухамид ответственный,трудолюбивый, мужчина в возрасте 63лет,женат.   Абдухамит 40 лет работал преподавателем в школе а на данный момент он пенсионер.   Своим честном трудом он поставил на ноги своих пятерых детей и дал высшее образование.    Так как сейчас у него есть свободное время чтобы заняться бизнесом,он решил возле дома открыть магазин где  продает продукты питания и хоз товары.   По бизнесу ему помогает его жена.   Абдухамид хочет расширить свой товарооборот и на полученный кредит хочет закупить продукты питания и хозяйственные товары.
texts.en:
Abduhamid is a responsible and hard-working man of 63. He is married. Abduhamid worked as a school teacher for 40 years, but is now retired. Through honest work, he raised his five children and made sure they all got higher education. Since he now has free time to operate a business, Abduhamid has decided to open a shop near his home, where he sells food and household goods. His wife helps him with the business.

Abduhamid would like to increase his merchandise turnover and wants to use this loan to stock more food products and household goods.

loans.use: to buy food and household products for his shop

loans.name: Mirzokadam

texts.ru:
Мирзокадам житель города Куляб. Ему 30 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Жена Мирзокадама домохозяйка. Сам Мирзокадам имеет средне - специальное образование. У него имеется мастерская, где он занимается починкой музыкальных инструментов. Также Мирзокадам дает в аренду музыкальные инструменты. Этим видом деятельности он занимается шесть лет. 
Мирзокадам просит кредит для приобретения новых музыкальных инструментов и запчастей.
texts.en:
Mirzokadam lives in the city of Kulob. He is 30 years old, married, and has three children. His wife takes care of the household. Mirzokadam has a vocational degree. He runs his own shop where he repairs musical instruments and also rents them out. He has been engaged in this activity for the past six years.

Mirzokadam is requesting a loan to purchase new musical instruments and spare parts.

loans.use: to buy new musical instruments and parts for his repair shop

loans.name: Nargiz

texts.ru: Nargiz was 38 years old. She is married and has 3 children. Nargiz needs 1700 (AZN) Azerbaijani New Manat for  to buy some calves for improving hiss business in future. She has been in this cattle breeding business 5 years. She it breeds only cows. Nargiz is an Internally Displaced Person (IDP) from Fizuli town. Nargiz and her family now live in Fizuli region. She needs to increase monthly income for her family.
texts.en:
Nargiz is 38 years old. She is married and has 3 children. Presently, she needs 1700 AZN to buy a few calves in order to improve her business. Nargiz has been in the cattle breeding business for the past 5 years, and only breeds cows.

Nargiz is an internally displaced person (IDP) from the city of Fizuli and presently lives with her family in the Fizuli region. She needs to increase her family's monthly income.

loans.use: to buy calves for her cattle breeding business

loans.name: Zaynurbi

texts.ru:
Зайнурби жительница города Куляб. Ей 50 лет. Она вдова. У нее четверо детей. Сын Зайнурби работает в городе Душанбе. Сама Зайнурби работает на рынке. Она готовит и продает пирожки, бутерброды, кофе. Также она дома готовит первые национальные блюда и приносит на рынок. Этим видом деятельности Зайнурби занимается 12 лет. Она на протяжении 12 лет одна зарабатывает и воспитывает детей. 
Зайнурби просит кредит для покупки продуктов и приобретения необходимой посуды.
texts.en: Zaynurbi lives in the city of Kulob. She is 50 years old, widowed, and has four children. Her son works in the city of Dushanbe, while Zaynurbi works at a market in Kulob. She prepares and sells small pies, sandwiches and coffee. Additionally, she cooks traditional dishes at home and brings them to the market. Zaynurbi has been doing this for the past 12 years, earning an income and raising her children alone. She is requesting this loan to purchase ingredients for her food, as well as necessary cookware and dishes.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients and cookware for her food stall

loans.name: Rajamo

texts.ru:
Рачамо 47 - летняя женщина проживающая в городе Душанбе. Она замужем. У нее пятеро детей. Муж Рачамо работает поваром. Ее сын находится на заработках в Российской Федерации.
Рачамо занимается торговлей на рынке. Она в основном занимается торговлей детской и подростковой школьной одежды. Этим видом деятельности она занимается десять лет. Рачамо просит кредит для покупки осенней детской одежды.
texts.en:
Rajamo is a 47-year-old woman who lives in the city of Dushanbe. She is married and has five children. Rajamo's husband works as a cook, while their son has left to find work in Russia. Rajamo is a merchant at the market and mainly sells school clothes for children and teenagers. This has been her occupation for the past ten years.

Rajamo is requesting this loan to purchase children's fall clothing.

loans.use: to buy children's fall clothing for her shop

loans.name: Chan Thol

texts.en:
Chan Thol, age 45, has worked in a garment factory for over four years. She earns about $3 daily. She lives with her husband and their two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. Her husband (shown with her in the picture) runs a business of buying, repairing, and reselling second-hand motorcycles. He earns about $3 per day from this venture. One of her children is employed in a pure drinking water factory and also earns about $3 per day. 

Chan Thol is requesting a loan of $600 in order for her husband to be able to purchase a second-hand motorcycle to repair and offer for resale. 

In the future, she would like to expand the business and build a new house for the family.

loans.use: to purchase a second-hand motorcycle to repair and offer for resale

loans.name: La

texts.en:
La, age 23, sells groceries to earn a living. She has run her business for over a year and earns about $2 daily. She and her husband have one child and live in Takeo Province, Cambodia. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $3 each day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, La is requesting a loan of $300 to purchase more grocery items to offer for sale. By doing so, she is confident that she will be able to make more profit in order to better financially support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her store and be able to send her child to a good school. She also hopes to build a new house for the family as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items to offer for sale

loans.name: Thy

texts.en:
Thy, age 51, grows rice and fattens cattle to earn her living. She earns about $3 daily and has been engaged in this work for 20 years. She and her husband have four children and live in Takeo Province, Cambodia. 

Her husband (shown with her in the picture) is a construction worker who earns about $4 each day. Two of their children are grown and are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $7 daily. 

Thy is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a plot of land to resell at a profitable price. In the future, she would like to expand her business and rebuild her house to make it bigger and more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of land to resell at a profitable price

loans.name: Chreb

texts.en:
Chreb, age 30, is a farmer. She has been growing agricultural crops and vegetables for more than seven years, earning approximately $8 daily. Her husband helps her run the business. They live with their two children in Kandal Province, Cambodia.  

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Chreb is requesting a loan of $800 to purchase a motorcycle to use for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to purchase vegetables in the village to sell at the market for additional income. She also hopes to be able to send her children to a good school. Moreover, she plans to build a new house for the family as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle to use for commuting

loans.name: Bunthain

texts.en:
