He will also use the loan to pay for plowing fees. Houm hopes that he can yield a better harvest than the previous years through the loan use. In the future, Houm plans to own a livestock farm in order to raise and breed animals for trading purpose.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies such as chemical fertilizers and pesticides and to pay for plowing fees.

loans.name: Seak

texts.en: Seak has been a client of HKL for five loans already and she has found that the previous loans had a positive impact on her business as well as her living conditions. That is why she has turned to HKL again for a loan to purchase a boat with its motor and fishing materials for her son's fishing activities. She hopes that Kiva lenders will keep lending to her to help her improve her standard of living.  Seak is now 64 years old and has become a widowed mother of five children. Three of her children are married and two are single. In the future, Seak wants to have a small convenience shop from her home, where she sells a mixture of things to local people in her community. She is very thankful for the generosity of kind lenders.

loans.use: to purchase a motor boat and fishing materials for her son's business

loans.name: Chheng

texts.en:
Chheng is a 28-year-old married woman who has been living in the Baray district with her husband and one child who is attending school. Chheng is a proud farmer with a two-hectare farmland where she grows rice and other crops according to each season. She is able to generate income of 10,000 KHR per day through farming. Aside from the farming business, Chheng devotes her spare time to purchase and sourceing hair for local hairdressers. Chheng has been in these businesses for more than 12 years. 

Chheng would like to borrow a loan of 3,000,000 KHR, which will be used as a sufficient capital for the hair-purchasing business.  She hopes that she will be able to make a good income with the help of the loan. Chheng has borrowed once from HKL and she has completely paid back the loan already.

loans.use: to purchase hair for local hairdressers

loans.name: Pa

texts.en:
Pa is 56 years old and married with single children, one of whom is employed in a garment factory. The rest of the children are still attending local schools. Pa and his wife are raising their children in a small village in Reussey Keo district. To earn a living, Pa is a paid worker in a metal shop in his village as his second business, generating around 3.00 USD per day. Rice farming is his first business. 

Pa would like to fix his present house partially because it is decayed and suffers from the weather. Consequently, it seems hard for his family to live in any longer. To deal with the problem, Pa is seeking a loan to add to his savings to renovate his house. He hopes that he can have a suitable house and provide comfortable living conditions for his wife and children.

loans.use: to renovate his house.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
This is Virginia, 56, a resident of Dasmariñas, Cavite City, Philippines. She manages her own household while operating her business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her family's everyday expenses.

Virginia operates a food stall. She sells vegetables at the community market. She buys a large quantity of vegetables and sells them per kilo or per pack. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of Php 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue the operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 10,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more vegetables to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business.  

Virginia dreams to have a good future through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week. She also draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for vegetables and other products needed in her business

loans.name: Johanna Margarita

texts.es:
En el balneario San Clemente del Cantón Sucre cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal 1 de Diciembre. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, que son muy visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros  ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.

En este lugar vive la señora Johana, tiene 31 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 11, 9 y 6 años, el mayor estudian en  colegio y los menores en escuela. El marido es comerciante. Lleva más de 7 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos salen muy rápido y sin tantos requisitos.

Ella realiza el crédito para utilizarlo en un negocio familiar que tiene junto a su esposo, de compra y venta de camarón y langostinos, su esposo compra en las lanchas y barcos estos productos para luego en su carro llevarlos a las empacadoras que envían al extranjero. Llevan más de 8 años con el negocio de venta de langostinos. Ellos también tienen un bus en una cooperativa de transporte que hace recorridos hasta Portoviejo, autobús que conduce una persona a quien le pagan un sueldo mensual.
 
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar camarón, langostinos y repuestos para el autobús.
 
Su sueño es seguir en su negocio junto a su esposo.
texts.en:
Every 15 days, the Banco Comunal 1 de Diciembre meets in the San Clemente del Cantón Sucre beach resort. This location is known for its beautiful beaches, which are often visited by many domestic and foreign tourists. It offers a diversity of beautiful places and a rich variety of typical regional dishes.

Johana lives in this location. She is 31 years old; she is married and has three children, who are 11, 9, and 6 years old. Her eldest child studies in high school, and her younger children are in primary school. Her husband is a businessman. She has spent more than 7 years in the Banco Comunal, and she likes it because the loans are distributed more rapidly and without many requirements.

She is taking out this loan to use for her business, which she has with her husband. The business buys and sells shrimp and prawns. Her husband buys the products in the launches and boats, and later brings them in his car to the packers that send the products to foreigners. They have spent more than 8 years in the business of selling prawns. They also have a bus in a transportation cooperative that has routes through Portoviejo. The autobus drives one person to whom they pay a monthly wage.

This loan is going to be used to buy shrimp, prawns, and spare parts for the autobus.

Her dream is to continue this business with her husband.

loans.use: to buy shrimp, prawns, and spare parts.

loans.name: María De Lourdes

texts.es:
En el balneario San Clemente del Cantón Sucre cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal 1 de Diciembre. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, que son muy visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros  ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 48 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación  tiene tres hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun viven en su casa. El marido es obrero.

Ella es una gran ama de casa que para ganar el sustento diario y ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar ya que él no gana mucho, se dedica a la venta de bocadillos y comidas rápidas, además de sodas, aguas, jugos, entre otras cosas. Trabaja todos los días desde las 15h00 hasta las 21h00,  le ha ido muy bien en su negocio y es así como ella contribuye con los gastos del hogar y mucho más cuando su esposo se queda sin trabajo, lleva más de 23 años con este negocio el cual le ha servido para sacar adelante a su familia.

Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar carne, sodas, jugos y otros víveres para preparar los alimentos. Esta desde el inicio  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos salen muy rápido y sin tantos requisitos.
 
Su sueño es tener un gran restaurante.
texts.en:
Every 15 days, the Banco Comunal 1 de Diciembre meets in the San Clemente del Cantón Sucre beach resort. This location is known for its beautiful beaches, which are often visited by many domestic and foreign tourists. It offers a diversity of beautiful places and a rich variety of typical regional dishes.

María lives in this location. She is 48 years old and is married. From this relationship, she has three children who are already grown; two of her children live in her house. Her husband is a workman.

She is housewife. To earn a living and to help her husband with the household expenses since he does not earn much, she makes a living selling sandwiches and fast food, in addition to sodas, water, and juices, among other things. She works every day from 3:00 in the afternoon until 9:00 in the event. Her business has been doing well; this is how she contributes to the household expenses, and this contributed much more when her husband was without work. She has spent more than 23 years in this business, which has served to get her family ahead. 

This credit is going to be used to buy meat, sodas, juices, and other provisions to prepare her food. She has been with Banco Comunal since it began, and she likes it because the credits are distributed more rapidly and without many requirements.

Her dream is to have a large restaurant.

loans.use: to buy meat, sodas, juices, and other provisions.

loans.name: Tutigul

texts.ru: Тутигул 39 лет и всегда старается улучшить условия жизни и стимулировать экономическое состояние семьи. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Ее муж простой рабочий и получает маленькую зарплату. Это зарплата не хватает для обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами.    Тутигул решила помочь мужу для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес с куплей продажей  скота, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своих детей с хорошим образованием и высококалорийными продуктами питания. Она запрашивает кредит на сумму 1000 сомони для покупки скота, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Tutigul always tries to improve her standard of living and the economic well-being of her family. She is a 39-year-old married woman raising three children. Her husband is a simple worker. His salary is small, and it is not enough to provide for all of the family's needs. 

Tutigul has decided to help her husband provide for the material well-being of their family. With this in mind, she took a course, "Achieve Success," organized by the Association of Business Women, and she received a certificate. Now she is able to organize her own business and become successful. 

She wants to start a business buying and selling livestock, as she has experience in this type of work. With the income from this business, she plans to ensure that her children have a good education and high calorie foods. She is requesting this loan of 1000 somoni to buy livestock so she can start her new business. She is hoping for your kindness!

loans.use: To buy cattle for organizing new business

loans.name: Salomat

texts.ru:
Саломат жительница района Шахритус. Она вдова. Ей 48 лет. У нее трое детей. Ее дети находятся на заработках за рубежом. 
Саломат более семи лет занимается животноводством. Она в основном разводит крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Саломат берет кредит для закупа телят с целью увеличения поголовья скота.
texts.en:
Salomat is a 48-year-old widow living in the Shahrituz region. She has three children who work abroad. 

Salomat has worked in animal husbandry for more than seven years. She mostly breeds cattle for future sale. Salomat would like this loan to buy calves in order to increase the number of cattle she owns.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Vugukuri Group

texts.fr:
Odette fait partie du groupe Vugukuri et habite à Bujumbura. Elle a  31 ans et est mariée à  Audifax, un agriculteur. Ensemble ils ont  4enfants âgés de  7 à 15 ans, dont 3 étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de poissons appelés ndagala et de l’huile de palme depuis 17 ans. 

Elle est à son  onzième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de poissons appelés ndagala et de l’huile de palme  à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait  acheter sa propre parcelle et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en: Odette, age 31, is a member of Vugukuri Group. She lives in Bujumbura and is married to Audifax, a farmer. Together, they have four children, age 7 to 15, out of which three are studying. For more than 17 years, Odette has been selling dried fish, called ndagala, and palm oil. She's seeking her 11th loan from Kiva's partner, Turame. With this new Kiva loan, she will bolster her working capital and buy a large quantity of ndagala fish and palm oil to resell, in order to increase her income. In the forthcoming years, she would like to buy her own lot of land and see her children go to school.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of dried fish and palm oil to resell

loans.name: Kossi

texts.fr: Revendeur de boissons à Lomé, Mr Kossi est marié à une commerçante. Ils ont 03 enfants tous scolarisés. L’ainé ayant 20ans et le dernier 12ans. Lui même est âgé de 37ans. En 2009, il s’est lancé dans la vente des boissons à son domicile. Pour répondre aux besoins des clients, il s’approvisionne à la Brasserie du Bénin. Il sollicite son second crédit afin d’acheter des boissons. Avec les profits, il souhaiterait épargner, avoir une boutique pour bien vendre et veiller au bien – être de la famille.
texts.en: Kossi, age 37, is a beverage reseller in Lomé. He's married to a merchant, and they have three children, who all go to school. The eldest is 20, the youngest is 12. In 2009, Kossi started selling beverages at his home. To meet customer demand, he gets his supplies from La Brasserie du Bénin, a brewery and soft drink company in Lomé. He's seeking a second loan in order to buy beverages. With his profits, he would like to put some money away, have a shop to sell better, and look after his family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy beverages

loans.name: Amévi

texts.fr: Père de famille de 03 enfants tous à l’école, Mr Amévi est revendeur de produits d’alimentation générale, des produits divers dans une boutique. Il fait en même temps des photocopies. Il y a un moment ou il fait des opérations financières avec notre institution et il sollicite son troisième crédit pour s’approvisionner en produits d'alimentation générale et machine photocopieuse afin de répondre aux besoins des clients. Avec ce crédit, il désire s’acheter des produits d’alimentation générale et une machine photocopieuse. Il veut épargner les profits réalisés, devenir grossiste sans oublier que son désir primordial est le bien être de la famille. Il est à préciser que Mr Amévi est âgé de 52ans et qu’il est dans ce domaine il y a11ans.
texts.en: Amévi is father to a family of three children, who all go to school. He is a retailer of general groceries and other products in a shop. At the same time he does photocopies.  He has had financial transactions with our institution for some time and is now requesting his third loan to get fresh supplies of groceries as well as a photocopier so that he can respond to customer demand. With this loan he would thus like to buy general groceries and a photocopier. He wants to save the profits he makes and become a wholesaler, without forgetting that his fundamental objective is his family's well-being. It should be noted that Amévi is 52 years old and that he has been working in this field for the past 11 years.

loans.use: to buy general grocery products and a photocopier.

loans.name: Konoussi

texts.fr: Dame  de 41ans, Konoussi mariée à un professeur de golf ont 02 enfants tous scolarisés. Le premier a 10ans et le dernier 06ans. Elle est revendeuse de liqueurs depuis 2002 à domicile. Pour bien répondre aux besoins des clients, elle sollicite de WAGES un second crédit pour acheter des liqueurs. Avec les profits réalisés, elle souhaiterait agrandir l’activité par l’ouverture prochaine d’une boutique et voir sa famille mieux s’épanouir.
texts.en: Konoussi is a 41-year old woman, who is married to a golf teacher and has two children who are both at school. The eldest is ten years old and the youngest six. She has been selling liquor from her home since 2002. In order to meet customer demand she is requesting a second loan from WAGES to buy liquor. With the profits she makes she would like to expand her business by opening a shop and she also wants her family to prosper.

loans.use: to buy liquor.

loans.name: Kokou

texts.fr: Soudeur  de profession, Mr Kokou exerce son activité depuis 1998 dans son atelier. Il vit avec sa femme coiffeuse et ses 02 enfants âgés de 14 et 12ans qui sont scolarisés à Lomé. Mr Kokou âgé de 39ans s’y plait dans son activité de soudeur  car elle lui procure des revenus lui permettant de prendre soin de sa famille. Son premier crédit qu’il sollicite lui permettra d’acheter des fers pour la fabrication des baraques de fer. Il veut assurer une bonne éducation, une bonne nutrition à sa famille  et si possible à l’avenir, rouvrir d’autres ateliers.
texts.en: Kokou is a welder by trade and he has been carrying out his business in his workshop since 1998. He lives with his wife, who is a hairdresser, and his two children, who are 14 and 12 years old respectively; they both go to school in Lomé. Kokou is 39 years old and enjoys his work as a welder as it brings him in sufficient income to take care of his family. This first loan he is requesting will allow him to buy iron to make iron houses. He wants to ensure a good education and sufficient food for his family and, if it is possible in the future, to open other workshops.

loans.use: to buy iron.

loans.name: Kossi

texts.fr: Mr Kossi vit avec sa femme revendeuse et son enfant de 04ans qui est scolarisé à Lomé. Il est éleveur de volailles et est aidé par 01 personne pour l’avancement de son projet. Son activité se fait à domicile et il sollicite dans notre institution un premier prêt pour acheter de la nourriture à ses poussins. Il voudrait bien entretenir la famille, assurer leurs éducations, augmenter le nombre de pondeuses pour produire plus d’œufs avec les profits réalisés.
texts.en: Kossi lives with his wife, who is a retailer, and his four-year old child, who goes to school in Lomé. He raises chickens and is helped by another person in order to build up his business. He carries out his activity from home and is requesting a first loan from our institution to buy food for his chickens. With the profits he makes, he would like to be able to take good care of his family, provide for their education and increase the number of egg-laying chickens so he can produce more eggs.

loans.use: to buy food.

loans.name: Koffi

texts.fr: Tenancier de bar depuis 2007, Koffi âgée de 40ans est mariée à une revendeuse et ils ont 01 enfant de 08ans qui va à l’école. Son activité se fait avec 01 personne dans un bar. Il sollicite de WAGES  un premier prêt pour l’achat de  boissons à la Brasserie du Bénin. Il veut ouvrir une autre boutique et assurer le bien-être de la famille.
texts.en: Koffi, who is 40 years old, has been the manager of a bar since 2007 and is married to a retailer; they have one child who is eight years old and goes to school. He carries out his business in a bar with one other person. He is requesting a first loan in order to buy drinks from the Benin Brasserie. He wants to open another shop and ensure his family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy drinks.

loans.name: Ayawavi

texts.fr: Epouse d’un conducteur, Ayawavi âgé de 42ans a un enfant de 22ans qui ne va plus à l’école. Elle vend depuis 1996 des produits d’alimentation générale, du mais du haricot et des ignames à domicile. Elle sollicite dans notre institution un second crédit afin d’acheter des marchandises (tomate, sucre…), des céréales et des tubercules.  Elle voudrait élargir son activité en ouvrant un second point de vente.
texts.en: Ayawavi, who is 42 years old, is married to a driver and has one child, who is 22 years old and no longer goes to school. Since 1996 she has been selling general groceries, corn, beans and yams, from her home. She is requesting a second loan from our institution to buy goods (tomatoes, sugar...), cereals and tubers. She would like to expand her business by opening a second outlet.

loans.use: to buy general groceries.

loans.name: Sikenatou

texts.fr: Madame Sikenatou vit avec son mari revendeur et leur 03 enfants à Lomé. Deux des enfants sont scolarisés. Le premier a 18ans et le dernier 05ans. Sikenatou âgée de 31ans est revendeuse de charbons de bois à domicile. Elle fait son approvisionnement à l’intérieur de la ville de Lomé et par moment, elle rencontre des problèmes comme la rareté des charbons de bois en période de pluie. Pour renforcer son activité de vente de charbons de bois, elle sollicite de WAGES un prêt premier pour acheter de la marchandise. Elle veut réinjecter les profits dans l’activité, multiplier les points de vente et assurer les besoins élémentaires de la famille. Il y a de cela 08ans qu’elle est dans cette activité.
texts.en: Sikenatou lives in Lomé with her husband, who is a retailer, and their four children. Two of her children go to school. The eldest is 18 years old and the youngest five. Sikenatou is 31 years old and sells charcoal from home. She gets her supplies inland from the town of Lomé and sometimes has problems, such as the scarcity of charcoal in the rainy season. In order to build up her charcoal-selling business, she is requesting a first loan from WAGES to buy in stock. She wants to reinvest her profits in the business, multiply the points of sale and provide for her family's basic needs. She has been carrying out this business for the past eight years.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Robiyakhon

texts.ru:
Робияхон проживает в районе Кубодиен. Ей 54 года. Она разведена. У нее пятеро детей. Сыновья Робияхон находятся на заработках за рубежом. Сама Робияхон имеет высшее образование, агроном. По профессии она работает уже 25 лет. Кроме того Робияхон занимается животноводством. Этим видом деятельности она занимается более шести лет. 
Робияхон просит кредит для закупа бычков.
texts.en: Robiyakhon lives in the Kubodien region.  She is 54 years old, divorced with five children, and her sons work abroad.  Robiyakhon has received higher education as an agronomist, a profession she has worked in for 25 years.  She has also worked in animal husbandry for more than six years.  Robiyakhon is asking for a loan to purchase bulls.

loans.use: to purchase bulls

loans.name: Hojiboy

texts.ru: Хочибой умный и трудолюбивый молодой человек. Ему 18 лет. В этом году он окончил школу и поступил в университет с целью получения высшего образования. Его любимые предметы это математика, история и химия. В свободное время он читает зарубежную литературу, а также занимается спортом. В основном он играет футбол и участвует в соревнованиях. В семье их четверо, Хочибой, родители и его старший брат. Его родители получают маленькую зарплату и не в состоянии оплатить за учебу детей. Хочибой запрашивает кредит для оплаты учебы в университет. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Hojiboy is a smart and hard-working young man, aged 18.  He finished school this year and registered for university with the goal of earning a higher education.  His favorite subjects are math, history and chemistry.  In his free time, he enjoys reading foreign literature and playing sports - he mostly plays soccer and participates in competitions.  There are four in his family: Hojiboy, his parents and his older brother.  His parents earn very little money and aren't in a position to pay for their children's education.  Hojiboy is requesting a loan to pay for his university studies.  He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for university study.

loans.name: Sherali

texts.ru: Шерали мужчина в возрасте 52 лет, женат имеет шестерых детей.     Трое его сына находятся на заработках в Российской Федерации.     Сам Шерали работает в колхозе поливальщиком полей,а также занимается с молодости откормом и продажей скота.     Сейчас у него несколько десятков мелко рогатого скота, коз и баранов.     Он знает все преимущество этого бизнеса.    На полученный кредит он хочет купить двадцать молодых овец для выращивания и откормив их хочет продать за хорошую цену. Заранее благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en:
Sherali is a 52-year-old man who is married and has six children. Three of his sons have left to find work in Russia. Sherali works at a collective farm as a field irrigator, but since his youth has also raised livestock for sale. Presently, he keeps several dozen small animals like goats and sheep. Sherali knows well all the benefits of this business. 

Using this loan, Sherali would like to purchase twenty young sheep, whom he will raise for subsequent resale at a profit. He thanks you in advance for your support.

loans.use: to buy twenty young sheep

loans.name: Shodmon

texts.ru:
Шодмон проживает в районе Шахритус. Ему 21 год. Он холост. Шодмон живет с родителями. Его отец работает строителем. 
Шодмон зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Он закупает скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Этим видом деятельности он занимается три года. Шодмон просит кредит для закупа бычков, телят и одной коровы. Он нуждается в вашей поддержке.
texts.en: Shadmon lives in the Shakhritus region.  He is 21, single, and lives with his parents.  His father is a construction worker.  Shadmon works as a cattle breeder and buys stock for future sale.  He has been in this line of work for three years.  Shadmon is asking for a loan to purchase bulls, calves and one cow.  He needs your support.

loans.use: to buy bulls, calves and a cow.

loans.name: Magda

texts.en: Magda is 29 years old. She is married to Bladimher. She operates a business buying and selling bottles and plastic from house to house. She usually earns PHP 300 a day. She is now asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy plastics and bottles in the village. She needs to purchase more products to increase her sales which will enable her to improve their poor living condition.

loans.use: to buy plastics and bottles

loans.name: Em

texts.en:
Em is 46 years of age and a widowed mother of five children. Two of her children are married and have independent lives and the remaining children are still single and live together with Em in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. Em is in the business of cultivating rice on her existing farmland, where she can earn a decent income to support their living. Due to high cost of commodities, Em can’t cover her expenses and she is experiencing financial difficulties. She wanted to improve her family financially, so she decided to devote herself to a recycling business to better her household income. She usually goes through the villages to collect and buy recycle materials. Then, she resells them to a local recycling industry for profit.

Em has applied for a loan from HKL and Kiva to purchase recycled materials for resale. She hopes that she will be able to provide basic necessities for her children and pay for their education.

loans.use: to purchase recycled materials.

loans.name: Tan

texts.en: Tan is 47 years old. He has two children who are studying at school. He is a driver who transports tourists and goods. From his job, he gains 5,000,000 VND a month. He has taken part in SEDA's crediting program since 2009. The last cycle, he borrowed 7,392,000 VND and repaid this loan on time. In this loan cycle, he wants to borrow 8,736,000 VND to support and repair his car. He hopes his income could afford for his children education’s fee.

loans.use: to support and repair his car

loans.name: Ly

texts.en:
Ly is 40 years old, married, and has three school-aged children, permanently living in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. She and her spouse help each other in the farming business in order to support their living and to provide basic necessities for their children. Despite their hardship, they intend to send their children to a good university in Phnom Penh after they graduate from high school. 

Ly would like to improve her farming practices and yield a better income each season, so she is asking for a loan in the amount of 2,000,000 KHR to rent a tractor to till the land and to purchase farm supplies needed for her rice crops such as fertilizers and pesticides. In the future, Ly aspires to be a successful entrepreneur who owns many hectares of farmland.

loans.use: to rent a tractor to till the land and to purchase farm supplies needed for her rice crops such as fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Rauza

texts.ru:
Рауза жительница Спитаменского района. Ей 50 лет. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Рауза занимает животноводством. Этот вид деятельности являет семейным бизнесом. Рауза более семнадцати занимается разведением мелко - рогатого скота у себя дома.
Рауза просит кредит для закупа бычков.
texts.en: Rauza lives in the Spitamen region. She is 50 years old, married, and has four children. Rauza raises livestock, which is her family's business. For over seventeen years, she has been breeding goats and sheep at home. Rauza is requesting a loan to purchase calves.

loans.use: to buy calves for her livestock breeding business

loans.name: Lida María

texts.es:
En el balneario San Clemente del Cantón Sucre cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal 1 de Diciembre. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, que son muy visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros  ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.

En este lugar vive la señora Lida, tiene 60 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación tienen tres hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive en su casa. Su esposo se dedica tanto a la pesca como a la agricultura.

Ella tiene un pequeño bazar en su casa, allí trabaja todos los días pero los días que más vende son los fines de semana días ya que llegan muchos turistas hasta este hermoso balneario. Ella vende sandalias, ropa, bisutería y muchos productos mas pero casi todos con motivos playeros, los cuales son muy solicitados por sus clientes que llegan a diario hasta su bazar, ella tiene más de 8 años con su negocio y le va bastante bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su bazar va a comprar sandalias, bisutería, ropa, etc.  Está en el Banco Comunal hace más de  10 años  y le gusta porque con uno de los créditos empezó su negocio y con los siguientes lo ido mejorando día a día.

Su meta es seguir mejorando su local.
texts.en:
In the resort of San Clemente del Cantón Sucre, the First of December Community Bank meets every 15 days. This place is known for its beautiful beaches that are visited by many local and foreign tourists. It offers a diversity of beautiful places and a rich variety of typical dishes of the region.

In this place lives Lida. She is 60 years old. She is married and, fruit of this relationship, are three children who are adults. One of them still lives at home in her house. Her husband is dedicated to fish and also farming.

She has a small shop in her house. There she works every day but the days when she sells most are weekends since many tourists arrive in this beautiful resort town. She sells sandals, clothing, costume jewelry and many more products but almost all with beach themes, which are requested by her customers who arrive daily in her shop. She has more than 8 years experience with her business and it's going quite well.

This loan is going to be used to stock her shop. She is going to buy sandals, costume jewelry, clothing, etc. She has been in her community bank for more than ten years and she likes it because she started her business with one of the loans and with the subsequent ones she has been improving it day by day. 

Her goal is to continue improving her shop.

loans.use: to purchase sandals, costume jewelry, clothing, etc.

loans.name: Hoeurn

texts.en:
Hoeurn, aged 41, is a humble villager from Prey Chor district, where Hoeurn and her spouse are raising their four children and operating a rice farming business for their livelihoods. Hoeurn owns a one and half hectare lot of farmland, on which she primarily grows rice for sustenance. The earnings seem barely enough to cover their daily costs. Hoeurn’s husband wanted to better their living standard, and consequently started working in the construction industry to add more income for the family.

With this loan in the amount of 300 USD, Hoeurn would like to purchase farm inputs for her crops such as fertilizers and pesticides. Through using the loan, Hoeurn hopes that she can have a fruitful harvest and yield a better income in this coming season.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs for her crops such as fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Kann

texts.en:
Kann is 63 years old and married with seven children, four of whom have started their own families living in the province and three of whom are attending school and who need daily allowances. She a resident living in Kampong Chhnang province. Kann has spent most of her lifetime dedicated to rice farming and is able to make an average income of 8,000 KHR each day. Her spouse and some of her children help to manage this business.

Kann is requesting a loan through HKL, a longstanding Kiva partner, to purchase fertilizer and pay for labor costs to transplant rice. Her loan will allow Kann to have enough capital to invest in her current business. She hopes that she can obtain a plentiful harvest this coming season.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pay for labor costs to transplant rice

loans.name: Ayaba

texts.fr: Madame Ayaba à 33ans. Elle est mariée à un maçon carreleur et a 02 enfants dont 01 à l’école. Le premier a 07ans et le dernier 02ans. Ayaba est revendeuse dans un marché. Elle vend des bijoux et des habits à toutes personnes. En cette période de vacances, il  y a des motifs qui sortent chez les grossistes et elle voudrait en profiter c’est pour cela elle sollicite de WAGES un second prêt pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Elle voudrait avoir une boutique et assurer l’avenir de ses enfants.
texts.en: Mrs. Ayaba is 33 years old. She is married to a mason/tiler and has two children of which one attends school. The first is seven and the last is two years old. Ayaba is a saleswoman at the market. She sells jewellery and clothes to all clients. In this holiday period, there are designs that are being produced by the wholesalers and she would like to be able to buy them, this is why she requests a second loan from WAGES to buy stock. She would like to have a shop and ensure her children's future.

loans.use: to buy jewelry

loans.name: Thou

texts.en:
Thou is a farmer who lives in a peaceful village with three single children while her oldest child is settled for marriage and lives away. She is 58 years old and a widowed woman who is very diligent and honest in her daily farm work. She owns a few pieces of land for cultivating rice and other seasonal crops. She has been in this occupation for more than 30 years. 

Thou is requesting a loan of 500,000 KHR to buy fertilizer and pesticides used in farming, and also pay for plowing fees. These inputs will really help in ensuring good nutrition for the rice crops and the ability to produce an abundant harvest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides used in farming and pay for plowing fees

loans.name: Luy

texts.en:
Luy is 59 years old and is a noble woman who lives in Ornlong Veng district, Oddar Meanchey province. She is married with three children, two of whom are currently married and live separately while the remaining child is single and lives under the same roof with her. To earn a living, Luy is involved in three business ventures at the same time: rice farming, traditional wine-distilling, and hog-raising. From these businesses, she is able to yield a better income, which she uses to satisfy her living needs. 

Luy is requesting a loan from HKL, one of Kiva's partner, to purchase necessary farm supplies such as a water pump, fertilizers, and insecticides to apply on her rice crops. In the future, she plans to save money to buy extra farmland to increase her production.

loans.use: to purchase a water pump, fertilizer, and insecticides for her rice crop

loans.name: Gloria Dolores

texts.es:
En el balneario San Clemente del Cantón Sucre cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal 1 de Diciembre. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, que son muy visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros  ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.

En este lugar vive la señora Gloria, tiene 67 años de edad, hace varios años su querido esposo falleció y quedo viuda pero de esa relación  tiene tres hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive en su casa.

Después de la muerte de su esposo ella para salir adelante sola surtió una pequeña ferretería en su casa, allí junto a su hijo trabajan todos los días, en su local sus clientes encuentran de todo tipo de materiales de construcción y herramientas, venden desde cemento, hierro, materiales eléctrico y sanitarios, a ella le gusta tener de todo ya que con esto gana más clientela, lleva cinco años en su negocio y le va muy bien ya que vende a diario muchos productos.

Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar todo tipo de materiales de construcción. Esta desde el inicio  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos le han ayudado mucho para salir adelante.
 
Su sueño es tener un camión para ir a comprar y trasladar el material.
texts.en:
In the resort of San Clemente del Cantón Sucre, the First of December Community Bank meets every 15 days. This place is known for its beautiful beaches that are visited by many local and foreign tourists. It offers diversity of beautiful places and a rich variety of dishes typical of the region.

In this place lives Gloria. She is 67 years old. Many years ago her dear husband died and she became a widow but from this relationship she has three children who are adults. One of them still lives at home.

After her husband's death, she - to get ahead - started a small hardware store in her house. Along with her son, she works there every day. In her shop, her customers find all types of construction materials and tools. She sells cement, iron, electrical and health materials. She likes to have everything since with this she earns more customers. She has five years' experience with her business and it's going very well since she sells a lot of products daily.

This loan is going to be used to buy all type of construction materials. She's been with the community bank since the beginning and she likes it because the loans have helped her a lot to get ahead.

Her dream is to have a truck to go make purchases and transport the material.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Ablavi

texts.fr: Veuve de 58ans, Madame Ablavi est mère de 04 enfants qui ne vont plus à l’école. Le plus âgé a 35ans et le dernier 20ans. Elle est revendeuse de beignets et de la boisson locale depuis 2009 à domicile. Elle manque de fonds pour s’approvisionner en marchandises (farine de blé, d’huile, de sucre pour la préparation du beignet et du mil pour la préparation de la boisson locale c’est pour cela, elle sollicite de WAGES un second prêt. Elle voudrait à l’avenir avoir plus de clients, un grand point de vente pour la boisson locale. Son souhait aussi est d’assurer la scolarité de sa benjamine et construire plus tard sa propre maison.
texts.en: A widow of 58 years, Mrs. Ablavi is the mother of four children who no longer attend school. The eldest is 35 years old and the youngest if 20. She has been a saleswoman of fritters and local drinks from her home since 2009. She is short of funds to buy stock to make fritters (flour, oil, sugar) and of millet for the preparation of the local drink. This is why she requests a second loan from WAGES. In the future she would like to have more customers, have a big sales point for the local drink. Her wish is also to pay for her youngest child's education and subsequently build her own house.

loans.use: to buy the basic necessities for the preparation of fritters and the local drink.

loans.name: Rayimjon

texts.ru:
Райимчон родился 1956 году. Он проживает в районе Спитамен. Райимчон женат. У него трое детей. Его невестка занимается шитьем национальной одежды. 
Райимчон на протяжении двадцати лет занимается разведением крупнорогатого скота у себя дома. Животноводством он занимается вместе с семьей. Райимчон закупает скот, разводит и продает по более выгодной цене. Он просит кредит для закупа телят и бычков.
texts.en: Rayimjon was born in 1956 and lives in the Spitamen region.  He is married and has three children.  His wife sews national costumes.  For 20 years, Rayimjon has been breeding cattle at his home and he raises livestock with his family.  Rayimjon buys livestock, raises his herd and sells them at an affordable price.  He is asking for a loan to buy calves and bulls.

loans.use: to buy calves and bulls.

loans.name: Irma Del Socorro

texts.es:
Irma es una mujer muy trabajadora, hoy en día, su vida ha dado cambios no muy positivos, se separo de su esposo, cambio de su pequeño negocio de venta de tortilla, vendía ropa, Cd, hasta una pequeña pulpería, el cual con ahorros, ayuda del compañero y financiamientos en Afodenic logro establecer, y que se le vino abajo por la mala administración de créditos otorgados a los clientes.
Lo que comienza a  laborar como domestica,  con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Pues tiene sus tres hijos estudiantes, el cual requieren mucho cariño, comprensión y educación en la etapa de la adolescencia.
Con este préstamo comenzara la construcción de un cuarto que le permita mejor comodidad a sus hijos, materiales a comprar: piedra, bloques, arena, cemento, hierro, tablas de madera, para comenzar la obra
texts.en:
Irma is a very hard working woman. Today, her life has given her changes that are not very positive. She separated from her husband, She changed her small business from selling tortillas, selling clothing, CDs, even a small grocery store, which, with savings, the help of a friend and financing Afodenic established and that went under from mismanagement of credit granted to customers.

She has started to work as a domestic with the desire to get ahead. Since she has three children who are students and who require a lot of care, understanding and education in this stage of adolescence. With this loan, she will begin the construction of a room that will provide better comfort for her children. The materials to buy: stone, blocks, sand, cement, iron, wooden boards to begin the work.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build a room.

loans.name: Danilo Jose

texts.es:
Don Danilo hoy en día, tiene un salario fijo, pues labora en una ferretería como despachador, y su pequeño negocio de su pulpería la atiende su esposa, el  ayuda por las noches a despachar,  su pequeño hijo sigue estudiando en la primaria. Este trabajo le ah ayudado para solventar mejores sus gastos y así poder seguir creciendo en su pequeño negocio.
Danilo invertirá en granos básicos, gaseosas, cereales, cajillas de huevos productos lácteos, siendo estos productos los más consumido por los clientes, por ser aprecios accesibles, el cual logra esta inversión con financiamiento en Afodenic, permitiendo mejor estabilidad económica para su familia.
texts.en:
Today Sr. Danilo has a fixed income as he works as a delivery person for a hardware store in the evenings. His wife looks after the grocery store. His young son attends primary school. Danilo’s job has helped him better cover household expenses and in this way he is able to continue growing his small business.

Danilo will use the loan to buy basic grains, soft drinks, cereals, boxes of milk products--items which are in the greatest demand as he sells them at affordable prices. He will be able to make this investment in his business with a loan from Afodenic and allow him a more stable income to support his family.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, soft drinks, cereals, boxes of milk products etc.

loans.name: Kuma

texts.fr: Technicien en informatique, Mr Kuma âgé de 30ans est marié à une couturière avec un enfant de 02ans en charge. Après avoir fini son apprentissage, il a ouvert un cyber en 2008 dans un quartier de la ville. Ses clients deviennent de plus en plus nombreux et les ordinateurs manquent c’est pour cela, il sollicite l’aide de WAGES pour en acheter afin de mieux les satisfaire et garder sa clientèle. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité tout en améliorant le niveau de vie de la famille.
texts.en: A computer technician, Mr. Kuma is 30 years old and married to a seamstress with one two year old child dependent on him. After finishing his apprenticeship, he opened an e-business in 2008 in one quarter of town. His clients are more and more numerous and for this reason he is short of computers. This is why he requests a loan from WAGES to buy some computers in order to give satisfaction to his customers and maintain his clientele. He would like to reinvest in his business at the same time as improving his family's living standards.

loans.use: to buy computers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy milk cows

loans.name: Irma Patricia

texts.es:
En el balneario San Clemente del Cantón Sucre cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal 1 de Diciembre. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, que son muy visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros,  ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.

En este lugar vive la señora Irma, tiene 33 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 14, 11 y 7 años de edad, las dos mayores estudian  en colegio y el menor en escuela. Su esposo es chofer.

Ella es  una gran ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos se dedica a la venta de productos naturales y  cosméticos de Esika (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y trabaja cinco  días a la semana de una o dos horas al dia y en los momentos que está desocupada no tiene un horario fijo, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada semana. Tiene 9  años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien, lo que más vende son los productos naturales  ya que son muy buenos.

Este crédito es para comprar productos naturales, perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y bisutería. Lleva más de 13 años  en el Banco Comunal, es la tesorera del grupo y le gusta porque el grupo es muy cumplido.

Su sueño es darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
In the resort of San Clemente del Cantón Sucre, the First of December Community Bank meets every 15 days. This place is known for its beautiful beaches that are visited by many local and foreign tourists. It offers diversity of beautiful places and a rich variety of dishes typical of the region.

In this place lives Irma. She is 33 years old, is married and, from this relationship, she has three children who are 14, 11, and 7 years old. The two eldest study in high school and the youngest in school. Her husband is a driver.

She is a great homemaker who, to obtain her own resources, is dedicated to selling natural products and cosmetics from Esika (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and women's accessories). Her means of selling is door to door and she works five days a week for one or two hours a day and when  she is not busy she doesn't have a fixed schedule. She sells her products on credit and collects every week. For nine years she has been dedicated to this business and it's going very well. She she sells the most are the natural products since they are very good.

This loan is to buy natural products, perfumes, creams, cosmetics and costume jewelry. She has 13 years with her community bank. She is the treasurer of the group and she likes it because the group is very accomplished. Her dream is to give the best to her children.

loans.use: to purchase natural products, perfumes, cosmetics and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Épouse d’un militaire, Madame Afi âgée de 44ans est mère de 02 enfants. Tous scolarisés, sont âgés de 13 et 08ans. Elle est revendeuse de bijoux de façon ambulante depuis 2005. Vu la qualité de ses produits, elle a de nombreux clients de parts et d’autres de la ville de Lomé et les demandes deviennent de plus en plus croissantes. Pour garder sa clientèle, et répondre aux besoins de ses clients, elle sollicite un cinquième prêt chez nous pour s’approvisionner en marchandises (bijoux) à Lomé et à Cotonou. Elle voudrait réinvestir dans l’activité, ajouter à la vente des bijoux, des pagnes et permettre à sa famille de s’épanouir.
texts.en: The wife of a military man, Mrs. Afi is 44 years old and has two children. Both attending school, they are aged 13 and eight years. She has been an itinerant jewellery saleswoman since 2005. In view of the quality of her merchandise, she has numerous customers in and around Lomé and she is increasingly in demand. To maintain her clientele, and satisfy her customers, she requests a fifth loan from us (WAGES) to buy stock (of jewellery) in Lomé and in Cotonou. She would like to reinvest in her business, add the sale of traditional dresses to that of jewellery and enable her family to blossom.

loans.use: to purchase jewellery

loans.name: German Horacio

texts.es:
El joven German de 22 años de edad, casado, tiene una niña de meses de edad, habita en el casco urbano de Nueva Guinea, trabaja como docente de primaria desde hace 7 años, cuenta con la ayuda de su esposa quien se desempeña como estilista,tambien cuenta con la ayuda de su mama quien le cuida a la bebe cuando ellos estan en sus horas laborales, ambos jovenes  trabajadores han luchado por tener su propia casita,  son reconocidos  en el municipio, muy queridos por sus vecinos y compañeros de labores por ser humildes y serviciales.                              
Solicita su  crèdito para ponerle verjas a las ventana de su casa, ya que le brindaria mayor seguridad a su vivienda.                                                 
su sueño es pagar bien este credito e ir mejorando su Vienda con futuros creditos y trabajo propio, para brindarle mejores condiciones a su linda familia.
texts.en:
Young German is 22 years old, married and has a daughter who is months old. He lives in the town of New Guinea. He has worked as a primary school teacher for seven years. He has the help of his wife who works as a stylist, as well as the help of his mother who takes care of the baby during working hours. The young, hard working couple has fought to have their own little house. They are recognized in their town, very well liked by their neighbors and colleagues for being humble and helpful.

He is requesting a loan to put up bars on the windows of his house since it will provide better security to his house. His dream is to pay this loan and to keep improving his house with future loans and his own work to provide better conditions to his beautiful family.

loans.use: to put bars on the windows of his house.

loans.name: Jacoba

texts.es:
Doña Jacoba tiene la edad de 48 años, casada,  habita en la colonia el verdun,  es Docente, vive con su mama y una hija que son sus responsabilidad, la niña tiene 14 añitos de edad quien estudia su secundaria. Doña Jacoba Labora en la Ecuela Pablo Antonio Cuadra, donde imparte clases de educacion primaria, ademas de su salario mensual que gana por impartir el pan de la enseñanza; cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo ambos son reconocidos en su comunidad por ser responsables, honestos y muy trabajadores.
Solicita su   crèdito, para realizarle  pequeñas reparaciones a su vivienda así como cambiarle zinc y comprar una docena de tablas que necesita para mejorar la vivienda, cabe mencionar que con el credito anterior logro realizar la construccion de una habitacion como lo tenia previsto y que a su vez agradece a Kiva por esta ayuda de financiamiento pues gracias a eso y esfuerzo de su trabajo ha ido mejorando su vivienda.

Su sueño es que su familia goce de mucha salud, trabajo y que exista estabilidad laboral.
texts.en:
48-year old Sra. Jacoba is married and lives in the Verdun neighbourhood. She is a teacher and lives with her mother and daughter, both of whom she supports. Her daughter is 14 years old and attends secondary school. 

Jacoba works at the Pablo Antonio Cuadra Primary School where she earns a monthly salary. She has help from her husband, and both are known in the community as responsible, honest, and hardworking.

Jacoba is seeking a loan to make some small renovations in her home. She wishes to change the zinc roofing and to buy a dozen floorboards which are needed to improve the house. It should be noted that with a previous loan she succeeded in building the room she had proposed. She is grateful to Kiva for the financial assistance as it, together with her hard work, has allowed her to improve her home. Her greatest wish is to have a healthy family and stable work.

loans.use: buy building supplies

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es: El Sr. Gabriel de 32 años de edad, casado, tiene 6 hijos todos menores de edad, habita en la Comarca Hermita, su esposa es ama de casa, el se esfuerza para que a su familia no falte el pan de cada dia, es una persona trabajadora, amable y de buen vivir, labora como agricultor y pequeño ganadero esta tradicion la ha obtenido de sus padres y la pone en prectica pues le da buen provbecho en su parcela de donde obtiene sus ingresos mensuales. Solicita este financiamiento para la compra de insumos que utilizara en la siembra de maiz. Su mayor proposito en la vida es generar mayores ingresos y que a su familia no le falte el pan de cada dia.
texts.en: Gabriel is 32 years old, is married and has six children. All of them are school age. He lives in Comarca Hermita. His wife is a homemaker. He works hard so that he family does not lack bread every day. He is a hard working, friendly, good humored person who works as a farmer and small rancher. He obtained this tradition from his parents and put it into practice since it gives good profits on their plot where they obtain monthly income. He is requesting this loan to buy inputs he can use to plant maize. His biggest purpose in life is to generate good income and that his family doesn't want for daily bread.

loans.use: to buy herbicides and insecticides.

loans.name: Badridin

texts.ru: Бадридин житель района Кубодиен. Ему 35 лет. Он женат. Его жена занимается растениеводством. Сам Бадридин занимается животноводством. Он разводит крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Этим видом деятельности Бадридин занимается шесть лет. Он берет кредит для закупа телят с целью увеличения их количества.
texts.en: Badridin lives in the Qubadiyon area. He is 35 years old and married. His wife grows crops, while Badridin raises farm animals. He breeds cattle for further sale. Badridin has been in this business for six years. He has requested a loan to buy calves and increase their headcount.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Tétévi

texts.fr: Jeune homme de 26ans, Tétévi vit avec sa femme qui est revendeuse et leurs 02 enfants à Lomé. Les deux enfants sont scolarisés et ils ont 09 et 07ans. Quant à Tétévi, il est revendeur d’huile à moteur dans une boutique depuis 06ans. Pour faire prospérer son activité et bien servir sa clientèle, il sollicite un prêt à WAGES pour s’acheter de l’huile à moteur. Avec les profits supplémentaires, il veut rouvrir d’autres boutiques, payer les frais de scolarité des enfants et subvenir aux moindres besoins de la famille.
texts.en: Tétévi is a young man of 26. He lives with his wife who is a saleswoman, and their two children in Lomé. The two children go to school, they are aged nine and seven. As for Tétévi, he has been a motor oil salesman in a shop for six years. For the success of his business and to give good service to his customers, he requests a loan from WAGES to buy motor oil. With the additional profits, he would like to open new shops, pay for his children's school fees, and provide for all his family's needs.

loans.use: to buy motor oil.

loans.name: Justiniano

texts.es: Don Justiniano tiene la edad de 52 años, casado, habita en la Comarca Chavarria, tienen tres hijos mayores de edad, su esposa es ama de casa y sus hijos le ayudan con los trabajos Agricola que ralizan para obtener sus ingresos y asi poder cubrir sus gastos en el hogar, Don Justiniano es una persona amable, cariñoso, responsable y muy dedicado a su labor, sus vecinos y amigos se expresan bien de él.  Don Justiniano le gusta prosperar como toda persona, por lo que solicita este financimiento para realizar comprar insumos para la siembra de Maiz, así como Insecticidas, Herbicidas; asi tambien pretende mejorar las condiciones de vida de su Familia.  Su mayor sueño es que Dios le de salud y tener una familia unida y sana.
texts.en:
Justiano is 52 years old, and he is married.  He lives in the Chavarria region, and he has three grown children.  His wife is a housewife.  His children help him with the farming work that he does to get his income.  This way he is able to cover the household expenses.

Justiano is a kind, affectionate, and responsible person who is very dedicated to his work.  His friends and neighbors speak highly of him.  

Justiano likes to do well, like everyone does.  That is why he is requesting this loan to buy supplies to plant corn.  He will buy things like insecticides and herbicides.  In this way he will also try to improve his family’s living conditions.

His biggest dream is for God to give him good health and to have a united and healthy family.

loans.use: to buy supplies, herbicides, and pesticides.

loans.name: Lidieth

texts.es: La señora Lidieth de 45 años de edad, casada, agricultora, habita en la Colonia San pablo, se dedica a realizar actividades agricolas en conjunto con su conyuge tambien es dueña de su propio inventario ganadero, actividades que son de suma importancia para el desarrollo socoioeconomico de su nucle familiar, desde hace aproximadamente 10 años estas actividades se han convertido como su fuente de ingresos para brindarle el bienestar a su familia. Solicita este financiamiento para invertirlo en establecimiento de 2 mzs del cultivo de yuca, asi como la preparacion del suelo entre otros; lo cual le permitira realizar dicho establecimiento de manera mas tecnificada con la intencion e interes de mejorar su produccion para obtener mayor rentabilidad, esta interesada en que su produccion se incremente y asi establecer variedad en tuberculos y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lidieth is 45 years old, married, and works in agriculture. She lives in the town of San Pablo. She makes a living in agriculture and along with her husband is the owner of her own livestock farm. These activities are of utmost importance to the socioeconomic development of her nuclear family, and in about ten years this livelihood has changed their source of income to help the wellbeing of their family. 

She is asking for this loan to invest in the establishment of two acres of yuca crop, like the preparing of the land among other things. This will allow her to establish a technical method of doing things and improve her production so that her endeavors are more profitable. She is interested in her production increasing and through that establishing variety and improving her standard of living.

loans.use: goods to plant Yuca.

loans.name: Ngan

texts.en: Ngan would like to take out a further loan to buy more food to sell from her stall. Ngan's previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attracting new customers and increasing sales. She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more food for her food stall

loans.name: Phan

texts.en: Phan would like to take out a further loan to buy more furniture and food to sell from her stall. Phan's previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attracting new customers and increasing sales. She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more furniture and food for her food stall

loans.name: Chrear

texts.en:
Chrear is a resident of the Prey Chor District of Kompong Cham Province. She is a 47-year-old widowed mother and has two adult children. Her oldest child is married and lives separately. Her youngest child lives at home, is single and employed as a sewing worker in Phnom Penh. 

In order to earn a living, Chrear devotes herself to a rice farming business; she can generate a decent income to cover her daily living needs with this business. She has been in this business for 27 years. 

Chrear’s son wishes to be an independent entrepreneur and own a small sewing shop at home rather than working for other people. For this reason, Chrear is requesting a loan of 250 USD to add to her capital so that she can purchase two sewing machines with different functions, which will be used by her son for his sewing services in their village. Chrear hopes that this will enable her and her son to further improve their businesses as well as their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase two sewing machines with different functions.

loans.name: Houng

texts.en:
Houng is 50 years old, a married woman who is responsible for five children. Houng and her spouse work in the same type of business, rice farming, on their inherited farmland located in Baray district, Kompong Tom province. They have been doing this for almost 23 years old, earning a profit of 20,000 KHR  each. Houng always dreams of having a better standard of living and providing further education to her children, so she has tried hard at the rice field, and also has been involved in purchasing and sourcing hair for local hairdressers as her supplementary income.

Houng is requesting for a loan from HKL and Kiva to pay for labor costs and to purchase five bags of fertilizer for her two-hectare farmland. This will allow Houng and her spouse to make their business more viable and profitable. She hopes to have a good harvest in the coming season. In the future, she wants to save some of her profit for the future expansion of her farming business.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs and to purchase five bags of fertilizer for her two-hectare plot of farmland.

loans.name: Rasmiya

texts.en: Rasmiya, 46 years old and a married woman, helps her husband who works as a truck driver to pay some of the household bills from the income she gets out of her small home business selling embroidered clothes and blankets. She has applied for this loan to bring in a new collection of clothes beside the ones she has to prepare for the upcoming holidays.

loans.use: to bring in a new collection of clothes

loans.name: Vann

texts.en:
Vann is a 56-year-old married woman who has been living in Kompong Cham province. She is a single parent who has three children, two of whom are already married. She owns and manages a few hectares of farmland, on which she grows rice both for food and for sale. She is able to make an average of 10,000 KHR to support herself. Vann’s son helps her earn income to elevate their living standard by operating a small electronics repair shop at home, where he provides his services to local people in his village. 

Vann's son wants to purchase electronics spare parts for his store, so that he can keep his business secure as well as stabilize his income. However, he has insufficient capital for that. Vann would like to help her son financially with this purchase, so she decided to take out a loan in the amount of 1,200,000 KHR to purchase more electronics spare parts for her son’s repair shop. In the future, Vann wishes to open an electronics shop for her son, where people can buy electrical equipment and get repair service.

loans.use: to purchase more electronics spare parts for her son’s repair shop.

loans.name: Lanie

texts.en:
This is Lanie, a resident of Bacoor, Cavite, Philippines. She is a mother to her children. She, together with her children, manages their own household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Lanie operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store, which retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a Php5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php15,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Lanie hopes to grow her business and dreams to give her family a good future through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Elvie

texts.en:
This is Elvie, 43, a resident of Bacoor, Cavite, Philippines. She is a mother to her six children. She, together with her chidren, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.  

Elvie operates a shoe and umbrella-repair shop. Her shop is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are in the local community. She earns a minimum of 350 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales daily. 

 To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 8,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy raw materials needed in her business. She expects a boost in income as she expands her business.  

Elvie hopes her business grows and dreams to be able to give her children a good and high quality education through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for raw materials needed in her business.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
This is Evelyn, 43, a resident of Bacoor, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Jerry, a construction supervisor, and is a mother to her child. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.  

Evelyn maintains a direct selling business. She sells cosmetics and other products through popular direct selling brands like Avon, Fuller Life, Natasha, Boardwalk, Marikina Shoe Exchange, and other direct selling brands. A customer's order is bought in cash by the dealer and then given to the customer with a one-month-to-pay credit.  Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She also has a variety store. A variety store is basically a small convenience store, which retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood   She earns a minimum of Php 2000 in sales every week.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 25,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy orders for her customers. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Evelyn hopes to grow her business in the coming years and dreams to have a good life for her family. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional stocks of supplies and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Laila

texts.en: Having a big family led Laila to start a small retail business at home to help her husband. She sells blankets and some home appliances, but now she is almost out of goods and for that reason she has applied for this loan to bring in more home appliances for sale.

loans.use: to bring in more home appliances for sale

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
This is Imelda, She previously accessed an 18,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase merchandise items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 22,000 PHP loan to buy more merchandise items and products to increase her product inventory. The more items she has on display and available on hand the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to cover her daily needs and educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Imelda hopes to grow her business in the coming years and dreams that her children will be able to graduate one day. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for merchandise items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Majeda

texts.en:
Majeda is a conservative woman, so she asked her husband to take her place in the photo.

Majeda is a mother of four children; they live in a rented house. Her husband has a small business selling used furniture from which he supports the whole family. Majeda decided to help her husband by applying for this loan to bring in more furniture so he can move his business into a separate independent store rather than having the furniture at home.

loans.use: to bring in more used furniture for sale

loans.name: Hadiya

texts.en: Hadiya is a mother of three daughters and a son. Her husband serves in the military. She has a small business at home which is a small convenience store where she sells detergents and other home products. She has applied for this loan to enhance her business by adding more shelves and stocking more goods and products to increase her profits.

loans.use: to add more shelves and stock more goods.

loans.name: Samira

texts.en: Samira, 45 years old and a  married woman, has a sewing and tailoring business at home where she makes clothing items and repairs them too. She has applied for this loan to buy a new sewing machine so she can in the near future employ a few people to help her.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine

loans.name: Ayman

texts.en: Ayman, a 25-year-old single guy, is one of a 10-member family living together. He is an independent person who rented a store and turned it into a mini-market that is serving the area to support him and help with the family financial matters. Now Ayman has applied for this youth loan to increase the inventory he has of goods and food products so he can increase his profits and buy the store instead of renting it.

loans.use: to increase his inventory of goods and food products

loans.name: Safaa

texts.en:
Safaa, 38 years old, is the mother of six. She is a hardworking mother who is helping the family by working as a teacher while her husband is a restaurant manager. After that, she started working with her husband at home, recycling wooden scraps to make beautiful furniture and decoration pieces. They collect the scraps from everywhere and sometimes buy them if that isn’t enough. Their house is their catalog: people come over and chose what they want them to make. 

Sometimes they get some help from carpenters for shaping difficult pieces because they lack the machines. Safaa has applied for this loan in order to buy new tools that will help them make new shapes and add more artistic drawings to what they do, so they can in the future have their own carpentry shop.

loans.use: to buy new tools that will help them make new shapes on wood

loans.name: Suhair

texts.en:
Suhair, 34 years old, is a conservative woman, so she asked her husband to take her place in the photo.

Her husband is a tailor who has a small tailoring workshop where he makes equestrian uniforms and sells them locally. He hopes that one day he can start selling to buyers outside the country. Suhair wants to support her husband so she applied for this loan to help first in improving the workshop itself and bring in more fabric so he can achieve his dream soon.

loans.use: to buy more fabric for her husband's tailoring business

loans.name: Abdallah

texts.en: Abdallah is a 47-years-old father of four. He owns and works in a barbershop from which he is supports his family. Being the only income they have, Abdallah decided to work on improving the barbershop's internal decoration so he can add more seats and include other services in the future. For that purpose, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to work on improving the barbershop's internal decoration.

loans.name: Ribhiyeh

texts.en: Ribhiyeh is a loyal wife who is living with her in-laws. She has no children. Having a lot of free time, she started a small home business selling clothes, blankets, and bridal make-up sets. For her it’s a way to be a productive woman and a way to support her husband to improve their living conditions. She has applied for this loan to purchase a new collection of clothes clothes for the upcoming holiday season to make more profit.

loans.use: to purchase new clothes to sell.

loans.name: Eid

texts.en: Eid is a  54-years-old father of six. He owns a small stationery and office supplies store. His oldest daughter is pursuing her BA degree. He has applied for this loan to support his daughter in her studies and to pay for her registration fees.

loans.use: to pay for his daughter's registration fees.

loans.name: Rola

texts.en: Rola is a  36-years-old mother of four children. She has a small home business selling women's clothes. She recently started making straw baskets and trays as well. She has applied for this loan to get more straw and other raw materials, and to add more clothing items to prepare for the coming Islamic holidays.

loans.use: to get more straw and other raw materials.

loans.name: Najwa

texts.en: Najwa, a 49-year-old conservative woman, asked one of her sons to take her place in the photo. Najwa and her family have a tailoring business that she wants to enhance, so she has applied for this loan to purchase another sewing machine, more thread and some raw materials.

loans.use: to buy another sewing machine.

loans.name: Marlon

texts.es: El Sr. Marlon, de 28 años de edad, es casado, habita en la comarca El Recreo, su esposa es ama de casa, tienen un hijo de 6 añitos de edad, Marlon es una persona responsable, honesto y muy dedicado a su labor; Trabaja en el Inta desempeñando el cargo de Jornalero por mas de 6 ños, con su trabajo y esfuerzo propio ha podido hacerse acreedor de su casa propia. Solicita este credito con el animo de comprar 40 laminas de zinc, ya que el techo esta en mal estado y lo quiere reparar antes de que entre en lleno el invierno.  Su sueño es brindarle comodidad a su familia y gozar de buena salud.
texts.en:
Marlon, 28 years old, is married and lives in the region of El Recreo. His wife is a homemaker, and they have a 6-year-old son. Marlon is a responsible person, honest and very dedicated to his work. He has worked for Inta as a day laborer for more than six years. Through his own work and effort he has been able to make himself deserving of his own home. 

He is asking for this loan with the intention of buying forty sheets of zinc, since the roof is in poor condition and he wants to repair it before winter begins. His dream is to give comfort to his family and enjoy good health.

loans.use: to buy zinc for the roof of his house.

loans.name: Huda

texts.en: Huda, a 23-year-old single lady living with her parents and four siblings, is attending a college in pursuit of a BA degree. She has applied for this loan to pay for her semester fees in order to continue her studies.

loans.use: to pay for her semester fees.

loans.name: Manwah

texts.en: Manwah, a 61-year-old widow, is taking care of her five sons and daughters by herself. To sustain the family, she conducts a home-based sewing and embroidery business using beads and threads. Manwah has applied for this loan to purchase more raw materials and more colorful beads.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials and more colorful beads.

loans.name: Ibtisam

texts.en: Ibtisam, a 27-year-old married mother of one son, sells kitchen wares and clothing items to help sustain and improve the family's living conditions. She is now requesting this youth loan to buy more goods and a new clothing collection.

loans.use: to buy more goods and a new clothing collection.

loans.name: Driffin

texts.en:
Driffin has been raising hogs for more than five years. He is separated and has two children.

Driffin would like to have a better way of life and a stable source of income.
